000059.SZ.summary: North Huajin Chemical Industries Co.,Ltd provides petrochemicals, chemical fertilizers, road asphalt, and lube base oils in China. It also offers synthetic resins, organic chemical raw materials, and plastic products. The company was formerly known as Liaoning Hua Jin Tong Das Chemical Company Limited and it changed its name to North Huajin Chemical Industries Co.,Ltd in February 2014. North Huajin Chemical Industries Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Panjin, China.

000060.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Zhongjin Lingnan Nonfemet Co. Ltd.
000060.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhongjin Lingnan Nonfemet Co. Ltd. produces and sells non-ferrous metals in China and internationally. The company undertakes cross-industry and cross-region operations that include mining, processing, smelting, manufacturing, research and development, construction materials, real estate development, trade, warehousing, and financial service. Its product portfolio includes fine lead ore, fine zinc ore, mixed lead/zinc ore, fine sulfur ore, electrolytic lead, fine zinc, silver, fine cadmium, germanium ingots, germanium dioxide, indium ingots, sulfuric acid, zinc sulfate, section aluminum, curtain walls, steel stripes, nickel hydroxide, zinc powder for batteries, and fibrous nickel powder. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000401.SZ.summary: Tangshan Jidong Cement Co.,Ltd. produces and sells cement, ready-mixed concrete, and clinker in China. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.

000408.SZ.summary: Zangge Holding Company Limited produces and sells potassium chloride under the Blue Sky brand in China. It also produces magnesium chloride under the Airline brand. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Golmud City, China.

000422.SZ.long_name: Hubei Yihua Chemical Industry Co., Ltd.
000422.SZ.summary: Hubei Yihua Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemicals and fertilizers in China and internationally. The company offers liquid chlorine, industrial sodium hydroxide, high purity hydrochloric acid, and polyvinyl chlorides. It also manufactures, installs, and trades thermoelectric and chemical machinery products. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

000426.SZ.long_name: Inner Mongolia Xingye Mining Co., Ltd.
000426.SZ.summary: Inner Mongolia Xingye Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, extracting, and smelting of non-ferrous and precious metals. Its products include lead, zinc, silver, tin, copper, iron, bismuth, tungsten, and other non-ferrous metals. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Chifeng, China.

000488.SZ.summary: Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited engages in the pulp production and paper making in Mainland China and internationally. It operates through Machine Paper, Financial Services, and Investment Real Estate segments. The company offers offset paper, white paper board, coated paper, lightweight coated paper, household paper, electrostatic copy paper and thermal paper, and glassine paper; and paper making raw materials and machinery. It also generates and sells electric and thermal power; manufactures, processes, and sells wood products, laminated boards, and fortified wooden floorboards; provides cement, wall materials, panel, and coal; and purchases and sells waste, as well as offers financial leasing services. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of catering services; hotel services; forestry, saplings growing, and processing and sale of timber and paper products; and mining, transportation, logistics, arboriculture, customs declaration, property management, trading, machinery manufacturing, printing and packaging, and investment management businesses. Shandong Chenming Paper Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Shouguang, the People's Republic of China.

000510.SZ.summary: Sichuan Xinjinlu Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells chlor-alkali chemicals and plastic products for industrial use in China. The company primarily offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC) resin, caustic soda, liquid chlorine, hydrochloric acid, interior wall decoration material, calendar leather, automotive interior leather and films, decorative film, and others. It also provides sodium alkali and potash, potassium hydroxide, special PVC resin, sodium hypochlorite, sodium hydroxide, and calcium carbide; and chemical design, warehousing, and other services. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Jinlu Group Co., Ltd. Sichuan Xinjinlu Group Co., Ltd. is based in Deyang, China.

000545.SZ.summary: Gpro Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells titanium powder in China. Its products are used in coating, papermaking, chemical fiber, ink, plastic tube, film, rubber, and leather, cosmetic, and other fields. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Africa, the United States, and other countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Jilin Gpro Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gpro Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. in March 2017. Gpro Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is based in Nanjing, China.

000553.SZ.summary: ADAMA Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a crop protection company. The company operates through Crop Protection (Agro), and Intermediates and Ingredients segments. It develops, produces, and commercializes herbicides, insecticides, and fungicides for farmers to protect from weeds, insects, and diseases. The company also offers intermediate materials and ingredients, such as food additives, Lycopan, synthetic aromatic products, dietary supplements, food colors, texture and flavor enhancers, food fortification ingredients, and other chemicals. In addition, it provides fragrance products for perfume, cosmetics, body care, and detergents industries; industrial products; and consumer and professional solutions. Further, the company engages in the other non-material activities. It primarily operates in Europe, North America, Latin America, the Asia Pacific, India, the Middle East, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Hubei Sanonda Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ADAMA Ltd. in December 2018. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. ADAMA Ltd. is a subsidiary of Syngenta Group Co., Ltd.

000565.SZ.summary: Chongqing Sanxia Paints Co., Ltd manufactures and sells paints and coatings primarily in China. The company offers anti-corrosion, industrial, automotive, architectural, furniture, silicone, fluorocarbon, and other paints. The company's products are used in the aerospace, aviation, military, petroleum, petrochemical, wind power, nuclear power, and other projects, as well as in bridges. It primarily operates under the Sanxia brand name. Chongqing Sanxia Paints Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Chongqing Paint Factory. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

000592.SZ.summary: Zhongfu Straits (Pingtan) Development Company Limited provides wood products under the Zhongfu brand in China and internationally. The company offers fir products, wet pine, cold-tolerant eucalyptus, golden lotus, etc.; fiberboards, laminated timber, finger jointed boards, and fine wood board products for use in furniture, household appliances, audio housings, pianos, sports equipment, handicrafts, vehicles, and ships; and financin and pledge financing services for corporate legal persons and individuals. It is also involved in the processing and sale of forest products; cultivation of seedlings; tree planting; and garden landscape design and construction activities. In addition, the company engages in the investment, construction, and operation management of sewage treatment and water plants; and concrete mixing franchise business. The company was formerly known as Fujian Zhongfu Industries Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zhongfu Straits (Pingtan) Development Company Limited in May 2014. Zhongfu Straits (Pingtan) Development Company Limited is based in Fuzhou, China.

000603.SZ.summary: Shengda Resources Co.,Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and development of non-ferrous metals in China. It primarily mines for lead, zinc, and silver. The company was formerly known as Shengda Mining Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shengda Resources Co.,Ltd. in October 2019. The company is based in Beijing, China.

000612.SZ.long_name: JiaoZuo WanFang Aluminum Manufacturing Co., Ltd
000612.SZ.summary: JiaoZuo WanFang Aluminum Manufacturing Co., Ltd engages in the smelting and processing of aluminum products in China. The company primarily provides electrolytic aluminum products. It is also involved in the generation and distribution of thermal power; distribution of non-ferrous metals; and production and distribution of coal. The company is based in Jiaozuo, China.

000615.SZ.long_name: Aoyuan Beauty Valley Technology Co., Ltd.
000615.SZ.summary: Aoyuan Beauty Valley Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, and operation of real estate properties in China. The company is involved in research and development, and manufacture of bio-based fiber and material series products; and the investment, construction, and operation of the theme town and the idyllic complex. It also acts as a general contractor for building construction. The company was formerly known as Kinghand Industrial Investment Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Aoyuan Beauty Valley Technology Co., Ltd. in November 2020. Aoyuan Beauty Valley Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Xiangyang, China.

000629.SZ.long_name: Pangang Group Vanadium & Titanium Resources Co., Ltd.
000629.SZ.summary: Pangang Group Vanadium & Titanium Resources Co., Ltd. engages in the production and supply of vanadium and titanium products in China and internationally. The company provides vanadium products, including vanadium pentoxides, vanadium ferrovanadiums, vanadium-nitrogen alloys, vanadium-aluminum alloys, etc.; and titanium products comprising titanium dioxides and slags, ilmenite, etc. Its products are used in steel, electronics, non-ferrous metals, coatings, and inks industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Panzhihua, China.

000630.SZ.summary: Tongling Nonferrous Metals Group Co., Ltd. engages in the exploration, mining, smelting, and processing of copper. The company offers copper cathodes, copper processing materials, copper flat wires, low oxygen copper rods, anodic phosphor bronzes, enameled round copper wires, cables, brass bars, precision copper and copper alloy plates, paper bag flat wires, enameled copper flat wires, transposed wires, and electronic copper foils. It also provides silver, sulfur concentrate products, monosulfide, sulfuric acid, crude nickel sulfate, mineral products, gold and concentrates, iron powder and pellets, and converter slag iron products. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Tongling, China.

000635.SZ.summary: Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd produces and sells chlor-alkali, lime nitrogen, and dicyandiamide products in China. It provides polyvinyl chloride, paste resin, calcium carbide, lime nitrogen, caustic soda, and corn starch glucose and l-lactic acid. The company is also involved in the production and sale of electricity and heat; production of PVC; and foreign investment and trade activities. In addition, it offers catering and accommodation services. Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shizuishan, China. Ningxia Yinglite Chemicals Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Guodian Younglight Energy Chemical Group Co., Ltd.

000637.SZ.summary: Maoming Petro-Chemical Shihua Co., Ltd manufactures and sells petrochemicals in the People's Republic of China. It offers polypropylene resin powders, secondary butyl acetate, methyl tert-butyl ether, ethanolamine, industrial and light white oil, ethylene, butane, propane, industrial hexane, cyclopentane, carbon, liquefied petroleum gas, and plastic products. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Maoming, the People's Republic of China.

000655.SZ.summary: Shandong Jinling Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the mining of iron ore. The company produces and sells iron, copper, and cobalt powder. It also offers single rope cages and YPC hydraulic hammers; and engages in machining, power generation, and goods export activities. The company is based in Zibo, China. Shandong Jinling Mining Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shandong Jinling Iron Mine.

000657.SZ.long_name: China Tungsten and Hightech Materials Co.,Ltd
000657.SZ.summary: China Tungsten and Hightech Materials Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and trades in nonferrous metals in China. The company's products include cemented carbide, tungsten, molybdenum, tantalum, niobium, and other nonferrous metals and its deep-processing products and equipment. It also offers cutting tools, mining facilities components, IT processing tools, wear parts, hard face materials, powders products. China Tungsten and Hightech Materials Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Hainan Jinhai Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Tungsten and Hightech Materials Co., Ltd. in 2000. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Haikou, China. China Tungsten and Hightech Materials Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Hunan Nonferrous Metals Corporation Limited.

000663.SZ.long_name: Fujian Yongan Forestry (Group) Joint-Stock Co., Ltd.
000663.SZ.summary: Fujian Yongan Forestry (Group) Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. provides various forest products in China. Its products include fir, pine, eucalyptus, hardwood, and other wood products; medium-density fiberboards; furniture; laminate flooring; formaldehyde; adhesives; and seedlings. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Yong'an, China.

000672.SZ.summary: Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells cement and cement clinker in China. It also provides aggregates, concrete, and other building materials, as well as engages in the real estate business. The company was formerly known as Baiyin Copper Commercial Building (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd in April 2013. Gansu Shangfeng Cement Co.,Ltd was founded in 1978 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

000688.SZ.summary: GuoCheng Mining CO., Ltd. engages in the mining and beneficiation of nonferrous metals. Its metals include lead and zinc mines, as well as associated gold, silver, and copper. The company also engages in the trading of mineral and non-ferrous metal products; and precious and rare metals, as well as in the development of non-ferrous metals and ferrous metals. In addition, it produces and sells downstream sulfuric acid. The company was formerly known as Jianxin Mining Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guocheng Mining Co., Ltd. in August 2018. The company is based in Beijing, China.

000697.SZ.summary: Ligeance Aerospace Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, smelting, and sale of molybdenum ore, associated sulfur, antimony, lead, and silver. The company primarily offers molybdenum fine powder. It is also involved in the development, production, sale, and maintenance of aero engines, gas turbine blades, and large unmanned aerial vehicles, as well as offers technical services; production, processing, assembly, and maintenance of aerospace components; and research and development of smelting technologies. In addition, the company provides aircraft-related precision and structural parts, including aircrafts wing leading surface and engine-related components, and lifting and lowering equipment and oil pump covers primarily used in commercial aircrafts, helicopters, engines, other aircraft, and industrial products; and a range of value-added services, such as component assembly, ancillary logistics, and fast shop floor services, as well as invests in mineral resources. Further, it imports and exports goods and technology. The company was formerly known as Shaanxi Ligeance Mineral Resources Co., Ltd. Ligeance Aerospace Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Xianyang, China.

000703.SZ.summary: Hengyi Petrochemical Co., Ltd. produces and sells petrochemical products in China and internationally. Its products include gasoline, diesel oil, kerosene, etc.; and petrochemicals, such as paraxylene, benzene, purified terephthalic acid, and caprolactam; and chemical fiber products, including pre-oriented yarn, fully drawn yarn, draw-textured yarn, polyester staple fiber, polyester chips, and polyester bottle chips. The company's products are used in textile and garment, home textile, and industrial applications. The company was formerly known as Shi Ji Guang Hua Technology Company Limited and changed its name to Hengyi Petrochemical Co., Ltd. in May 2011. Hengyi Petrochemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

000707.SZ.long_name: Hubei Shuanghuan Science and Technology Stock Co.,Ltd
000707.SZ.summary: Hubei Shuanghuan Science and Technology Stock Co.,Ltd primarily produces and sells heavy soda ash in China. Its heavy soda ash is used in manufacturing float glass. The company also provides light soda ash for manufacturing food, smelting, daily cleaning, and flat glass products; agricultural ammonium chloride; and industrial anhydrous sodium sulfate for use in vinylon, saponin, bleaching dyeing, synthetic lotion, glass, paper, leather, oil and gas pipeline anti-corrosion, metal smelting, surface treatment, fillers, and other industries. In addition, it develops and sells real estate properties; offers ammonia, liquid argon, sulfur, oxygen, fly ash, sulfuric acid, liquefied natural gas, and nitrogen; leases real estate properties; provides information consultation services; and produces and sells steam. The company also exports its products. Hubei Shuanghuan Science and Technology Stock Co.,Ltd is based in Xiaogan, China.

000709.SZ.summary: Hbis Company Limited produces and sells steel products in China. The company's products include hot and cold rolled coils, pickling rolls, galvanized coated coils, medium and wide plates, bars, wires, steel profiles, and steel strips. Its products are used in automobiles, home appliances, pipelines, bridges, machinery manufacturing, warehousing, and other fields. Hbis Company Limited is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

000717.SZ.summary: SGIS Songshan Co., Ltd. engages in the iron and steel business in China. The company offers iron and steel products, metal products, coke, and coal chemical products, as well as technical development, transfer, introduction, and consulting services. It also sells mineral products and coal. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shaoguan, China.

000731.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Meifeng Chemical Industry Co., Ltd.
000731.SZ.summary: Sichuan Meifeng Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical fertilizers in China. It offers urea, compound fertilizer, melamine, diesel exhaust gas treatment, nitric acid, and ammonium nitrate; and plastic-woven products and heavy-duty film packaging bags, as well as woven products. The company is based in Deyang, China.

000751.SZ.summary: Huludao Zinc Industry Co.,Ltd. engages in the smelting, processing, and selling metal products primarily in China. The company is involved in the zinc, copper, and lead smelting and deep processing; and cadmium, indium, sulfuric acid, and copper sulfate utilization processing activities. It also provides zinc ingot, electrolead, high purity, silver ingot, hot galvanized, zinc sulfate, and gold products. The company's products are used in the metallurgy, machinery, electronics, medicine, chemical, military, and other industries. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions. The company is based in Huludao, China.

000761.SZ.summary: Bengang Steel Plates Co., Ltd. engages in steel smelting, rolling, producing, trading, and selling ferrous metal products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers hot-rolled plates, cold-rolled sheets, special steel profiles, pig iron, and crude steel; and automotive surface panels, oil pipeline steel, container board shipboard, and other products for use in automobiles, home appliances, petrochemicals, aerospace, machinery manufacturing, energy transportation, construction and decoration, and metal products. It also involved in the electricity generation, coal chemical, railway, and import and export trade businesses. Bengang Steel Plates Co., Ltd. also exports its products to approximately 60 countries and regions. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Benxi, the People's Republic of China. Bengang Steel Plates Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Benxi Steel & Iron (Group) Co. Ltd.

000762.SZ.summary: Tibet Mineral Development Co., LTD engages in mining business. The company explores for chromite, copper, lithium, and boron deposits. Its products electrolytic copper; industrial-grade lithium carbonate, lithium hydroxide monohydrate, and battery-grade lithium carbonate; and lithium salts. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Lhasa, China.

000778.SZ.long_name: Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co., Ltd.
000778.SZ.summary: Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co., Ltd. engages in the research, manufacture, and trade of ductile iron pipes and tube castings, and steel products in China. It offers ductile iron pipes for water supply, sewage, gas, and heat applications, as well as special interfaces and coatings; ferrous metallurgy products, such as rolled ribbed steel bars for reinforced concrete; steel grating; composite tubes; and special and stainless steel pipes. It sells its products through a sales network in Asia, Europe, Africa, and America, as well as exports internationally. Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co., Ltd. as founded in 1971 and is based in Wu'an, China.

000782.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Xinhui Meida Nylon Co., Ltd.
000782.SZ.summary: Guangdong Xinhui Meida Nylon Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of nylon products in China. It offers nylon-6 chips and composite materials, multi-filaments, texturing yarns, polyamide and nylon fibers, and chemical knitting fabrics. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Jiangmen, China.

000789.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Wannianqing Cement Co., Ltd. produces and sells cement in China. Its products include ordinary Portland cement and composite Portland cement; commercial concrete of different grades for urban construction, high-rise buildings, railways, subways, bridges, etc.; prestressed concrete water pipes; and other building materials. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Nanchang, China.

000795.SZ.summary: Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and sale of rare earth permanent magnet materials in China. It also develops and produces automated logistics system integration and related equipment; lifting equipment, such as roadway stacking machines; and conveyors, including drums, suspensions, and plate chains, shelves, and rolled profiles, as well as provides electrical machinery and equipment. In addition, Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd. provides logistics management software that consists of warehouse management system and equipment control system. The company's products are used in the fields of aerospace, mechanical instrumentation, and medical equipment. The company was formerly known as Taiyuan Shuangta Ganyu Co., Ltd. Innuovo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taiyuan, China.

000807.SZ.summary: Yunnan Aluminium Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum and carbon products in China. Its products include aluminum foils and strips, electrical round aluminum poles, cast aluminum alloys, aluminum ingots, aluminum carbon products, and alumina. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Aluminum Plant. Yunnan Aluminium Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.

000815.SZ.long_name: MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd.
000815.SZ.summary: MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. The company offers cultural paper products, such as double-adhesive paper under the Miliyun brand, electrostatic copy paper under the Feng Yanglan brand, and offset and anti-myopia paper; color paper products, including offset, copy, cardboard, pearlescent, embossed base, silk cotton, and other paper, as well as fluorescent and ordinary business stickers; and corrugated, textured, and offset printing paper. It also provides cloud computing services. The company was formerly known as MCC Meili Paper Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. in July 2016. MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd. is based in Zhongwei, China.

000818.SZ.summary: Hangjin Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemicals in China. Its products include caustic soda, polyvinyl chloride, propylene oxide, polyether, chlorinated benzene, chlor-alkali, propylene oxide polyether, and other products. The company was formerly known as Fangda Jinhua Chemical Technology Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Hangjin Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2018. Hangjin Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1939 and is based in Huludao, China.

000819.SZ.summary: Yueyang Xingchang Petro-Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China. Its products include isobutene, non-woven propylene, polypropylene resin powder, propylene, methyl tert-butyl ether, industrial methanol, propane, industrial hydrogen, liquefied petroleum gas, and plastic woven bags. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Yueyang, China.

000822.SZ.summary: Shandong Haihua Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells chemical products in China. Its products include soda ash, industry salt, bromide, calcium chloride, potassium sulfate, magnesium chloride, and other products. The company's products are used in light, chemical, metallurgy, building material, medical, and other industries. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. Shandong Haihua Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Weifang, China.

000825.SZ.long_name: Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co., Ltd.
000825.SZ.summary: Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sales of iron and steel in China and internationally. The company's products include cold silicon steel, carbon steel hot rolled coil/plate, train axle steel, alloy mould steel, military steel, etc. It also offers stainless steel, slab, black ingot, black metal, ferroalloy, metalware, and other steel products. In addition, the company is involved in the export and import of raw material for iron and steel production. Its products are used in petroleum, chemical, shipbuilding, container, railway, automobile, urban light rail, power generation, spacecraft, and other sectors and industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taiyuan, China. Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Taiyuan Iron & Steel (Group) Co., Ltd.

000830.SZ.summary: Luxi Chemical Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical and fertilizer products. It offers coal chemical, salt chemical, and fluorosilicone chemical products; chemical materials; and chemical fertilizers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Liaocheng, China.

000831.SZ.long_name: China Minmetals Rare Earth Co., Ltd.
000831.SZ.summary: China Minmetals Rare Earth Co., Ltd. produces and distributes rare earth oxides, rare earth metals, and rare earth processed products in China and internationally. The company offers lanthanum, cerium, neodymium, europium, gadolinium, terbium, dysprosium, holmium, erbium, lutetium, praseodymium, samarium, and yttrium oxides. It also provides rare earth techniques research and consulting services. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Guanlu Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Minmetals Rare Earth Co., Ltd. in March 2013. China Minmetals Rare Earth Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Ganzhou, China.

000859.SZ.long_name: Anhui Guofeng Plastic Industry Co., Ltd.
000859.SZ.summary: Anhui Guofeng Plastic Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic products in China and Europe. It offers plastic films, wood plastic materials, and composite films, as well as engineering plastics and sapphire products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hefei, China.

000877.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Tianshan Cement Co., Ltd. produces and sells cement, clinker, and commercial concrete in China and internationally. It offers anti-sulfate cement, meso thermal Portland cement, low thermal slag Portland cement, road Portland cement, oil well cement, white cement, and colored cement for industrial, agricultural, water conservancy, transportation, military, civil, and other construction projects; cement products; and various prestressed and self-reinforced concrete components. The company also provides high-strength concrete, various grades of high performance concrete, steel fiber concrete, pervious concrete, impervious concrete, antifreeze concrete, fireproof concrete, and other special concrete products for ordinary and high-rise construction, roads, tunnels, viaducts, subway, and other projects. It is also involved in the waste heat power generation business. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Urumqi, China.

000898.SZ.summary: Angang Steel Company Limited engages in the production, processing, and sale of steel products in the People's Republic of China. Its principal products include hot rolled sheets, medium and thick plates, cold rolled sheets, galvanized steel sheets, color coating plates, cold rolled silicon steel, heavy rails and sections, seamless steel pipes and wire rods, and other products. The company also engages in ferrous metal smelting and steel pressing and processing activities. In addition, it sells metal materials and products, and building materials, etc.; provides wholesale and retail purchasing services; develops metallurgy and related materials and equipment; and purchases and sells metal and other materials, as well as imports, exports, wholesales, and retails technology products. Further, the company engages in the purification of cooking gas; production of coal products and dissolved acetylene; and sale of compressed and liquefied gas. The company's products are used in various industries, such as machinery, metallurgy, petroleum, chemical industry, coal, electricity, railway, shipbuilding, automobile, construction, home appliances, and aviation industries. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Angang New Steel Company Limited and changed its name to Angang Steel Company Limited in June 2006. Angang Steel Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Anshan, the People's Republic of China.

000902.SZ.summary: Xinyangfeng Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, and production of fertilizers in China. Its products include ammonium acid phosphate and potassium sulfate compound fertilizers; controlled release, urea formaldehyde, water-soluble, nitro group, and organic and inorganic fertilizers; special, potassium, urine-based, tower, BB, and P series fertilizers; and superphosphate and bicarbonate fertilizers, as well as hydrochloric acid. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinyangfeng Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2019. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jingmen, China.

000910.SZ.summary: Dare Power Dekor Home Co.,Ltd. engages in the wood-based panel and flooring businesses. The company offers Shengxiang branded flooring and Daya branded wood-based panels. The company was formerly known as Dare Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dare Power Dekor Home Co.,Ltd. in October 2016. Dare Power Dekor Home Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Danyang, China.

000912.SZ.summary: Sichuan Lutianhua Company Limited produces and sells fertilizer and chemical products in China. Its fertilizer products include urea, compound fertilizer, modified ammonium nitrate for agricultural use, and urea ammonium nitrate solution. The company's chemical products comprise diesel exhaust fluid, ammonium nitrate, ammonium sulfate, industrial nitric acid, industrial methanol, dimethyl ether (DME), and dinitrogen tetroxide, as well as butanediol and fatty chemical products. It provides its products under the Gonglong and Tianhua brands, as well as Akang, Huaifeng, Jiuhe, Xiaoya, and Wangu brands. Further, the company is involved in the logistic transportation business comprising ship and truck transportation along Yangtze River; and provision of by-products of DME and methanol, such as oxygen and nitrogen. Sichuan Lutianhua Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Luzhou, China.

000926.SZ.long_name: Hubei Fuxing Science and Technology Co.,Ltd
000926.SZ.summary: Hubei Fuxing Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. produces steel products in China. The company offers radial tire steel cords, tires steel products, PC steel hinges, steel wire ropes, prestressed PC steel strands, tire wires, and other products. The company also exports its products. Hubei Fuxing Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. is based in Hanchuan, China.

000930.SZ.summary: COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd. produces and sells fuel ethanol, citric acid, and lactic acid in China. The company was formerly known as COFCO Biochemical (Anhui) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd. in September 2019. COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Bengbu, China.

000932.SZ.summary: Hunan Valin Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ferrous metal products in China. It offers steel billets, seamless steel pipes, wire rods, rebars, hot-rolled ultra-thin strip coils, cold-rolled coils, galvanized sheets, small and medium-sized materials, and hot-rolled medium plates. Hunan Valin Steel Co., Ltd. is based in Changsha, China.

000935.SZ.summary: SICHUAN SHUANGMA CEMENT CO., Ltd manufactures and sells cement in China. It also engages in private equity investment management and football training activities. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, China.

000936.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huaxicun Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical fiber in China and internationally. It also provides asset management, investment consulting, merger and acquisition, and private equity and corporate shares trust investment services. In addition, the company is involved in banking business. It also operates approximately 170 branches in Shanghai, Zhejiang, Jiangsu, Fujian, Guangdong, Chongqing, Sichuan, Jiangxi, and Yunnan provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

000949.SZ.summary: Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes textile raw materials in China and internationally. Its products include cellulose filament and spandex yarns; and photochromic, thermochromic, intellectualized thermoregulation, bamboo, protein, and aloe fibers. The company exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions, such as Germany, Italy, Japan, South Korea, and India. Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. is based in Xinxiang, China. Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xinxiang Bailu Investment Group Co., Ltd.

000953.SZ.summary: Guangxi Hechi Chemical Co., Ltd produces and sells fertilizers in China. Its products include urea, compound fertilizers, liquid carbon dioxide, and methanol, as well as ammonia and sulfur. The company was formerly known as Guangxi Hechi Nitrogen Fertilizer Plant. Guangxi Hechi Chemical Co., Ltd was founded in 1969 and is based in Hechi, China.

000959.SZ.summary: Beijing Shougang Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells iron and steel products in Mainland China. The company offers hot rolling steel products, including hot-rolled car pickling plates, special steel products, saw blade steel, containers, pipeline steel, and hot rolled steel for automobiles and construction machinery. It also provides cold rolling steel products comprising oriented and non-oriented silicon steel, car boards, tinplates, home appliance boards, and color coated boards. In addition, the company is involved in the construction of freight port, catering, conference, and hotel operation, as well as provides technical consultation and services. Its products are used in automobiles, compressor, machinery manufacturing, hardware accessories, packing, household electrical appliances, industrial and electric motor, energy cars, transformer, and other industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

000960.SZ.summary: Yunnan Tin Company Limited engages in the tin production and processing activities in China. The company offers tin ingots, special tins for float glass production, bearing alloy ingots, lead-based alloys, tin-lead wire solders, zinc and tin zinc alloy wires, lead-free solder wires and bars, casting solder bars, extruder solder bars, tin granules, tin balls, spherical solder powders, ball grid array solder balls, tin and solder anodes, lead-free solder pastes, low-temperature solder pastes, and eutectic solder pastes. It also provides copper cathode products, tin chemicals, indium and silver ingots, tin base alloys, organic and inorganic tin chemicals, etc. The company also exports its products. Yunnan Tin Company Limited was 1883 and is based in Gejiu, China.

000962.SZ.long_name: Ningxia Orient Tantalum Industry Co., Ltd.
000962.SZ.summary: Ningxia Orient Tantalum Industry Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces rare metals in China. It offers antimony, titanium, and related alloys; titanium products, such as Titanium and titanium alloy wires, pipes, bars, ingots, rings and forgings, and slabs, as well as other compounds, including titanium tetrachloride and titanium trichloride; beryllium bronze alloys; photovoltaic materials comprising silicon carbide powders and cutting steel wires. The company also provides energy materials; superconducting series; and other products, such as molybdenum strips, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, potassium fluoride, molybdenum foils and strips, and high temperature infrared radiation coatings. Its products are primarily used in electronics, communication, aviation, aerospace, metallurgy, petroleum, chemical, sports, medicals, atomic energy, solar energy, and other fields. Ningxia Orient Tantalum Industry Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Shizuishan, China.

000973.SZ.summary: FSPG Hi-Tech CO., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic materials in China. The company offers packaging materials, including BOPA, BOPP drinking straw and cigarette packaging materials, and laminated AL films; electric and optical materials, such as BOPP capacitor and polarizer films; and construction materials comprising woven fabrics and PE-Xc pipes. It also provides personal healthcare and clothing materials that include EasyTex breathable membranes and PE casting embossed films; advertisement and labeling materials, which comprise PVC film for graphics use. FSPG Hi-Tech CO., Ltd. is based in Foshan, China.

000975.SZ.summary: Yintai Gold Co., Ltd. explores for, mines, and trades in precious metal and non-ferrous metals. It mines for gold, lead, zinc, and silver polymetallic deposits. The company was formerly known as Yintai Resources Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Yintai Gold Co., Ltd. in February 2013. Yintai Gold Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

000985.SZ.summary: Daqing Huake Company Limited develops, produces, and sells petrochemicals and fine chemicals primarily in China. The company offers chemical products, including heavy aromatics, crude isopentene, crude isoprene, industrial acetonitrile, industrial dicyclopentadiene, light aromatics, ethylene tar, crude pentadiene, hydrogenated pentene, light colour petroleum resins, and intermittent liquid phase bulk polypropylene powder. It also provides plastic products, such as polypropylene woven bag coating special materials and polyethylene insulation for communication cables, as well as medical and health products. The company also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions, such as Europe, Southeast Asia, and North America. Daqing Huake Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Daqing, China.

002002.SZ.summary: Hongda Xingye Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China. The company produces Tianhu PVC, calcium carbide, caustic soda, sodium carbonate, concrete, liquid chlorine, chlorane, green desulfurizer, and other products; chlor-alkali products; and quicklime. It also engages in the mining, refining, and separation of rare earth elements. In addition, the company produces and sells refined rare earth powder, rare earth carbonate, and separated rare earth products, as well as sells refined iron powder. Further, it offers rare-earth-based chemicals and polymer-oriented rare earth promoters; soil conditioners; and pharmaceuticals packaging materials, landscaping materials, PVC eco-house, PVC boards and films, interior and exterior decoration materials, and PVC construction boards. Additionally, the company provides electronic spot trading, logistics, procurement, information, and technical services; and environmental modification engineering services, such as soil remediation, desulfuration, and denitration, as well as develops soil amelioration and environmental improvement technologies. It also engages in the installation of mechanical and electrical equipment; the production and installation of pressure vessels; and the production of electricity and non-standard equipment. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Golden Material Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongda Xingye Co., Ltd. in June 2013. Hongda Xingye Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002010.SZ.summary: Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical products in northern, eastern, and southern China. It operates through Chemicals and Logistics segments. The company's products include dyeing additives, dyes, leather and chemical fiber oils, paint and construction chemicals, butadiene rubbers, fuels, and tires. It also provides transportation subcontracting, storage and logistic, hotel leasing, and logistical value-added services. In addition, the company engages in the joint development of highways and ports. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Transfar Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. The company is a subsidiary of Transfar Group Co., Ltd.

002012.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co., Ltd.
002012.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co., Ltd. produces and sells special long fiber and electrical papers. The company offers electrolytic capacitor, non-heat and heat sealed tea filter, and vacuum cleaner bag papers, as well as non-woven wallpapers series. Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Lishui, China.

002043.SZ.long_name: DeHua TB New Decoration Material Co.,Ltd
002043.SZ.summary: DeHua TB New Decoration Material Co.,Ltd produces and markets decorative plywood in China. The company offers plywood, flooring, and veneer products, as well as wooden doors. It operates 753 franchised stores. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Europe, Australia, the Middle East, and internationally. DeHua TB New Decoration Material Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Deqing, China.

002054.SZ.summary: Dymatic Chemicals,Inc. produces and markets textile auxiliaries and other fine chemicals in China. It offers pretreatment agents, dyeing auxiliaries, finishing agents, printing chemicals, specialty chemicals, cyclopentane, and innofarm products. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Foshan, China.

002064.SZ.summary: Huafon Chemical Co., Ltd. produces and sells spandex in China. It offers Qianxi spandex yarn, a PU elastic fiber for use in the fields of underwear, swimming suits, socks, jeans, leisure sportswear, medical bandage, fabric ribbon, diapers, etc. It is also involved in producing cyclohexanone, as well as other benzene related products; the import and export of textile products, such as spandex fiber; and dealing with power and heat cogeneration business. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Huafeng Spandex Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huafon Chemical Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Huafon Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Ruian, China.

002066.SZ.summary: Ruitai Materials Technology Co., Ltd. researches, produces, sells, and services refractories in the People's Republic of China. The company provides fused cast, basic, alumina-silica, silica, and unshaped refractories, as well as polybasic alloyed casting balls and bars, and low chromium alloyed castings bars and capsules balls. It serves glass, cement, steel and iron, nonferrous, electrical, petrochemical, and other industries. The company also exports its products. Ruitai Materials Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002067.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd.
002067.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jingxing Paper Joint Stock Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products primarily in China. It offers Kraft liner boards, white top linerboards, bobbin base papers, corrugated base papers, corrugated cardboards, paper boxes, bobbin base papers, and other specialty papers under the Jingxing brand name. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Pinghu, China.

002075.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Shagang Co. Ltd. manufactures steel products. It offers spring steel, bearing steel, marine anchor chain steel, alloy tube blank, and automobile steel; and anchor chain round bar for vessel, alloy structure steel, seamless tube billet for high pressure, continuous casting billets, corrosion resistant standard unit steel, steel for cold heading and cold intrusion, steel for fastening unit, carbon structure steel, hot rolled deformed bar, low alloy high strength structure steel flat bar, silicon sheet for electric motor, steel for fastening unit, petroleum well tubular steel, hardenability guaranteed steel, alloyed structural tubular steel, and carbon tubular steel. Its products are used in automobile manufacturing, railways, locomotives, ship building, and machinery manufacturing applications. It offers its products in Japan, Southeast Asia, Europe, America, and internationally. Jiangsu Shagang Group Huaigang Special Steel Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Jiangsu Huaigang Group Co. Ltd. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Huaian, China.

002078.SZ.summary: Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. produces and sells paper products in China. It offers coated papers, offset papers, and light-weight papers; copy papers, digital coated papers, and digital color laser papers; PE-coated paperboard for food packaging, sheet lining, service plate paper, and base paper for food products; and craft papers, recycled craft papers, fluting medium, white craft papers, coated ivory board, chrome ivory board, and cigarette carton papers. The company also provides industrial papers, including one-sided coated papers, coated paper without fluorescer, release base papers, interleaving papers for PS plate, stainless steel interleaving papers, aluminum foil interleaving papers, and thermal-sensitive base papers; and household paper products, such as coreless roll paper, roll toilet paper, box tissues, packet tissues, handkerchief paper, wet tissues, and baby diapers. In addition, it offers natural cellulose and craft board paper; and operates Shandong Sun Plaza International Hotel. Shandong Sunpaper Co., Ltd. offers its products under the Golden Sun, Huaxia Sun, Tian Yang, Weier, Sun Element, and Suyappy brands. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002080.SZ.summary: Sinoma Science & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells specialty fibers and composite materials in China and internationally. The company offers special fibers and composites, including glass fibers, three-dimensional fabrics, phenolic resins, composite molds, power composite materials, rail transportation composite materials, and automobile composite materials used in the aerospace, ship, track transportation, automobile, infrastructure construction, electricity, chemical corrosion, and other fields. It also provides lithium battery separators for lithium batteries and lithium battery materials; high-pressure gas cylinders, such as vehicle control CNG cylinders, automotive steel deep drawing CNG cylinders, tube bundles and hydrogen cylinders, etc.; composite wind power blades; filtration and separation materials used in the cement, steel, carbon black, electricity, and other industries; and engineering technology and equipment used in the defense, military, environmental protection, agriculture, plastics, rubber, high-voltage cable, and other industries. In addition, the company exports its products. The company is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002082.SZ.long_name: Wanbangde Pharmaceutical Holding Group Co., Ltd.
002082.SZ.summary: Wanbangde Pharmaceutical Holding Group Co., Ltd., an aluminum company, produces and sells aluminum profiles, aluminum decorative sheets, PS aluminum plates, aluminum alloy templates, sliding doors, etc. in China. It also sells its products in Europe, the United States, the Middle East, Africa Southeastern Asia, etc. The company was formerly known as Wanbangde New Building Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wanbangde Pharmaceutical Holding Group Co., Ltd. in April 2020. Wanbangde Pharmaceutical Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Huzhou, China.

002088.SZ.summary: Luyang Energy-Saving Materials Co., Ltd. produces and sells refractory and insulation materials in China and internationally. It offers ceramic fiber products, including Hp blankets, boards, unshaped products, papers, modules, anchors, folding blocks, textiles, blankets with aluminum foil, fire controller roller shutters, bulks, and felts; and bio-soluble fiber products. The company also provides alumina fiber bulks, blankets, strips, veneer modules, multi modules, felts, and boards; insulating firebricks and refractory mortars; and roofing thermal insulations. In addition, it offers SCR ceramic fiber papers, microporous hard and soft boards, ceramic fiber thin boards, biowool marine blankets, and ceramic fiber inorganic boards. The company was formerly known as Shandong Luyang Share Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Luyang Energy-Saving Materials Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Luyang Energy-Saving Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Zibo, China.

002092.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Zhongtai Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemicals under the Feng brand name in China. It offers polyvinyl chloride resins for processing and production of polyvinyl chloride boardy products, soft products, paints, and adhesive agents; and ion exchange membrane caustic soda for use in various industries, such as artificial fiber, textile, dyestuff, chemicals for daily use, petroleum and petrochemical, organic synthesis, pharmacy, chemical fertilizer, paper making, plastic, and water treatment industries. The company also provides chlor-alkali, crude salt, calcium carbide, and coke products. It also exports its products in Central Asia, Russia, South Asia, South America, and Africa. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in rmqi, China.

002096.SZ.long_name: Hunan Nanling Industrial Explosive Materials Co., Ltd.
002096.SZ.summary: Hunan Nanling Industrial Explosive Materials Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells civil explosive equipment and chemical products. Its products include permissible emulsion explosives for secondary coal mines; rock emulsion explosives; permissible emulsion explosives for tertiary coal mines; expanded ammonium nitrate explosives for primary coal mines; electronic detonators; and plastic detonators. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Changsha, China.

002101.SZ.summary: Guangdong Hongtu Technology (Holdings) Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision aluminum alloy die-casting parts in China. The company also researches, develops, produces, and sells anti-ballistic transport, military police, civilian bulletproof, recreational, ambulances, inspection, disabled and engineering, and other vehicles. In addition, it produces and sells interior and exterior trims, such as automobile signs, radiator grilles, and air conditioning vents, as well as engages in the investment business. Guangdong Hongtu Technology (Holdings) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.

002109.SZ.summary: Shaanxi Xinghua Chemistry Co.,Ltd produces and sells ammonium nitrate products primarily in China. The company also offers methanol, synthetic ammonia, sulfur, liquid oxygen, liquid argon and nitrogen, monomethylamine, dimethylamine, trimethylamine, dimethylformamide, and ammonium sulfate. Its products are used in the civil explosion and compound fertilizer industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Xingping, China.

002110.SZ.summary: Sansteel MinGuang Co., Ltd., Fujian manufactures and sells steel products in China. The company offers building materials, metal products, medium thick plates, machinery manufacturing materials, rebars, wire rods, and round bars. It also provides construction machinery steel, building steel, and structural steel products, as well as pre-stressed steel bars and rolling rebars. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Sanming, China.

002113.SZ.long_name: Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd.
002113.SZ.summary: Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical fertilizers and chemical products in China. The company provides urea, liquid ammonia, methanol, agricultural-use ammonia bicarbonate, compound fertilizers, sulfur and crude methanol, and other products. It also manufactures and sells plastic packaging products. The company was formerly known as Hunan Tianrun Enterprises Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. in July 2016. Hunan Tianrun Digital Entertainment &Cultural Media Co.,Ltd. is based in Yueyang, China.

002114.SZ.summary: Yunnan luoping Zinc&Electricity Co.,Ltd. engages in mining and processing lead-zinc ores in China. The company processes zinc ingots, crude indium ingots, cadmium ingots, zinc sulfide concentrate, electrolytic zinc, electrolytic cadmium, lead concentrates, antimony concentrate, and silver concentrates, as well as ultrafine and oxide zinc powder. It is also involved in hydropower generation. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Luoping, China.

002125.SZ.summary: Xiangtan Electrochemical Scientific Ltd. produces and sells electrolytic manganese dioxide (EMD) and new energy battery materials. The company offers C-Zn grade, alkaline grade, primary Li-MnO2 grade, and secondary Li-Mo grade EMD products. It also engages in urban sewage and industrial wastewater treatment activities, as well as provides related technical services. In addition, the company trades in ferromanganese alloys, electrolytic manganese metal, primary and secondary battery materials, manganese dioxide, manganese tetroxide, catalyst, discharge manganese, manganese carbonate ore, oxidized manganese ore, fund tray trading, etc. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries, including the United States, Japan, the European Union, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Xiangtan Electrochemical Scientific Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Xiangtan, China.

002132.SZ.summary: Henan Hengxing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells galvanized and stranded steel wires in China and internationally. The company primarily produces steel cords for radial tires, galvanized steel strands, PC steel strands, hose steel wires, diamond wires, and polycrystalline silicon sheets used in automobile tires, rubber hoses, power cables, overhead power lines, high-speed railways, ports, silicon wafer cutting for photovoltaic solar energy, etc. It also offers investment services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Gongyi, China.

002136.SZ.long_name: Anhui Annada Titanium Industry Co., Ltd.
002136.SZ.summary: Anhui Annada Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells titanium dioxide in China. The company offers rutile type, anatase type, green paint grade, and widely-used type titanium dioxide products under the Annada brand name. Its products are used in coatings, plastics, rubber, ink, paper, chemical fiber, ceramics, and other industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Tongling, China.

002145.SZ.long_name: CNNC Hua Yuan Titanium Dioxide Co., Ltd
002145.SZ.summary: CNNC Hua Yuan Titanium Dioxide Co., Ltd engages in the production, marketing, and service of titanium dioxide powder in China and internationally. Its products are used in the coating, printing ink, dcor paper/laminate, and plastic industries. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

002155.SZ.summary: Hunan Gold Corporation Limited engages in the exploration, mining, processing, smelting, and refining of gold ingot, tantalum, tungsten, and niobium products in China. Its principal products include gold, fine bismuth, antimony oxide, yttrium oxide, tungsten concentrate, and ammonium paratungstate products. It is also involved in the mine development and design, mechanical repair, and logistics and international trade activities. The company offers its products under the Chenzhou brand. The company was formerly known as Chenzhou Mining Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Gold Corporation Limited in May 2015. Hunan Gold Corporation Limited is based in Changsha, China.

002160.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Alcha Aluminium Group Co., Ltd.
002160.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Alcha Aluminium Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, processing, and sale of aluminum foils, coated aluminum foils for air conditioner, and aluminum strips and plates in China. Its primary products include fin stock for air conditioner, aluminum non-clad and clad materials for heat exchanger of automobile, PS sheet and plates, blind stock, aluminum alloy sheets, etc., as well as alloy foils for automotive parts. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Alcha Aluminium Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Alcha Aluminium Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Jiangsu Alcha Aluminium Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Changshu, China.

002163.SZ.long_name: Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co., Ltd.
002163.SZ.summary: Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and installs specialty glass, aviation materials, and PV curtain walls in China and internationally. The company offers glass products, including silica sand, low-e energy efficient glass, ultra-clear TCO glass, glass substrates, aviation glass, high-speed train glass, fire-proof glass, etc.; low-e energy-saving sheet, low iron TCO sheet, low iron PV sheet, and special sheet glass products; special fabricated glass products, such as electronic and solar glass, as well as energy-saving and safety architectural glass products, such as laminated glass, insulated glass, tempered glass, ceramic frit glass, fire-rated glass, bullet-proof glass, etc.; and ultrathin, tinted, and low iron glass products. It also provides single/double silver low-e IGU, temperable low-e, heat reflective glass, flat/bent tempered/HS glass, flat/bent laminated glass, flat/bent IGU, ceramic frit glass, bullet-resistant glass, fire-rated glass, laminated glass, 3D heat curved glass etc. In addition, the company offers high precision electron, electric appliances, solar energy anti-reflective, and anti-glare glasses, as well as magic mirror glass for LCD screens, shield glass, AZO coating glass, coating glass, super flat strengthened glass, glass bases, glass for electronic scales and home electronic appliances, etc. Additionally, the company provides curtain wall, skylight, and cladding systems, as well as aluminum windows and doors. Further, it offers design, processing, construction, and maintenance services; and custom design and engineering, testing, material procurement, fabrication drawing, in-house fabrication, and overseas delivery. The company was formerly known as AVIC Sanxin Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co., Ltd. in June 2020. Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002165.SZ.summary: Hongbaoli Group Corporation, Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells polyether and isopropanol products in China. The company offers polyether polyol for use in refrigerator insulation, spray foam, building board, and pipe insulation materials; polyurethane exterior insulation board for use in exterior wall insulation/internal insulation/self-heat insulation, and other wall insulation; and isopropanolamine for use in surfactants, pharmaceutical and pesticide intermediates, metalworking fluids, and oil and natural gas applications. It also provides propylene oxide for use in polyether polyols, propylene glycol and ether, lubricant synthesis, surfactants, detergents, and insecticides; dicumyl peroxide for use in rubber vulcanizing agents, cable crosslinkers, shoe material initiators, flame retardant additives, etc.; and lithium battery material. In addition, the company offers supply chain finance. It serves the home appliances, construction, flexible packaging, transportation, shoes, medical, electronics, and other industries. Hongbaoli Group Corporation, Ltd. also exports its products to approximately 50 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Hongbaoli Corporation, Ltd. and changed its name to Hongbaoli Group Corporation, Ltd. in May 2015. Hongbaoli Group Corporation, Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002167.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Orient Zirconic Ind Sci & Tech Co., Ltd.
002167.SZ.summary: Guangdong Orient Zirconic Ind Sci & Tech Co., Ltd. produces and sells zirconic products. The company offers zirconium dioxide, zirconium oxychloride, stabilized zirconia, zirconia ceramic structure, zirconium silicate, fused zirconia, zirconium sponge, and ceramic knife, as well as structural parts, such as zirconium ceramic parts, cutting blades, ceramic plates/precision gauges, ceramic plungers, and various parts. Its products are used in various applications and fields, including nuclear energy, special ceramics, biological ceramics, optical communication devices, solid-fuel battery, weapons, and aerospace fields, electronic ceramics, imitation jewel, ceramic glaze color, high fireproofing, and various new materials and industries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002170.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Batian Ecotypic Engineering Co., Ltd.
002170.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Batian Ecotypic Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of compound fertilizers in the People's Republic of China. It offers nitro phosphate fertilizers. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002171.SZ.long_name: Anhui Truchum Advanced Materials and Technology Co., Ltd.
002171.SZ.summary: Anhui Truchum Advanced Materials and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the metal base material processing business in China and internationally. The company offers copper alloy plates/strips, copper alloy wires, conductive copper bars, cold-rolled ribbon steel products, and precision welded tubes for use in various industries, such as power electronics, hardware, automobile, machinery, LED and rail traffic, etc. It also provides thermal equipment for carbon and carborundum based composite materials, high temperature composite materials, ceramic based composite materials, high-end vacuum heat treatment, and powder metallurgy manufacturing enterprises. The company was formerly known as Anhui Jingcheng Copper Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Truchum Advanced Materials and Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2015. Anhui Truchum Advanced Materials and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Wuhu, China.

002172.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. produces and sells chemical fibers in China and internationally. It offers various functional fibers, such as black and flame-retardant fibers, and long bundle wire, as well as conventional viscose fibers. The company also operates hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and pharmaceutical retail chains. In addition, it offers health management, pharmaceutical logistics, and teleconsultation services, as well as distributes pharmaceutical products. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Aoyang Technology Corporation Limited. and changed its name to Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. in September 2018. Jiangsu Aoyang Health Industry Co.ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002182.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Yunhai Special Metals Co., Ltd.
002182.SZ.summary: Nanjing Yunhai Special Metals Co., Ltd. engages in mining and non-ferrous metal smelting and processing in China and internationally. It offers magnesium, aluminum, strontium, and other raw materials that are used in transportation, 3C electronics, and aerospace industries. The company's products include magnesium grains and rods, magnesium alloy ingots and extrusion sheets, and aluminum alloy ingots and billets. It also provides strontium metal and master alloy products; and die casting and extrusion products, as well as micro channel flat tubes. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002192.SZ.summary: YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. provides energy saving and environmentally-friendly materials. It produces lithium concentrate, industrial and battery grade lithium carbonate, and lithium hydroxide monohydrate; lithium battery system; lithium salts; and lithium battery equipment, such as polymer battery automatic packaging, fixture forming, automatic air extractor, automatic liquid injection, automatic winding and ear welding, and automatic grouping machines. The company was formerly known as Luxiang Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. in August 2015. YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002203.SZ.long_name: Zhe Jiang Hai Liang Co., Ltd
002203.SZ.summary: Zhe Jiang Hai Liang Co., Ltd researches, develops, fabricates, sells, and services copper products in China. The company offers copper tubes, bars, and fittings; aluminum products; and copper-aluminum compound bars, including copper alloy tubes, HVAC tubes, seamless copper water/gas tubes, precision copper bars, copper/brass fittings, aluminum multi-port extrusions, aluminum profiles, and copper-aluminum compound bars, as well as inner grooved copper coils, copper alloy tubes, and lead-free copper bars. It also provides copper pipes, rods, pipe connectors, new conductor materials, copper processing equipment, etc.; and copper coil tubes; copper, brass, and copper-nickle straight tubes; copper, brass, and electrical conduct fittings; copper and brass bars; copper bus bars; aluminum tubes; and denitration catalysts, as well as equipment manufacturing services. The company's products are used in various applications, such as air conditioning and refrigeration, HAVC, water desalination, nuclear power, thermal power, equipment manufacturing, automotive industry, electrical, transportation, hardware machinery, and other industries. It also exports copper pipes and their connectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002206.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Hailide New Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial polyester yarns, plastic materials, and tire cord fabrics in China and internationally. The company's products include industrial polyester filament yarns; digital printing, coating, and decorative materials; and PET tire cord fabrics. Zhejiang Hailide New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Haining, China.

002211.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Hongda New Material Co., Ltd.
002211.SZ.summary: Shanghai Hongda New Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells silicone rubber products in China. The company's products include low-grade miscellaneous, die, high-grade sealing key, extrusion wire, flame retardant extrusion wire, heat-resistant extruded wire, cable joint, standard extrusion, ordinary vapor and nipple, high-grade nipple, swimming cap, high temperature resistant, flame retardant, car accessory, paper feeding rubber roller, gas phase rubber roller, general rubber roller, insulating, and water vapor resistant glue products; and ordinary molding adhesive, high-grade molded products, high resistance and tear gas, high temperature resistant steam adhesive, general molded products, low compression set, and conductive plastic products. Its products are used in various keyboard keys; wires and cables insulation; power, electricity, and household appliances sealing's; transportation insulation, moisture, weather resistance, and aging products; food, medical care, hygienic non-toxic, high temperature resistant, and physiologically inert; and high temperature resistant parts in the automotive field. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Hongda New Material Co., Ltd. Shanghai Hongda New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Yangzhong, China.

002215.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Noposion Agrochemicals Co.,Ltd develops, produces and sells agricultural inputs. The company offers pesticide preparations and plant nutrition products; and professional agricultural services, including technical and personnel support, farming, financial, agricultural information, agricultural products supply chain, and other services, as well as sensors and actuators. It provides its products under the Nuopuxin, Rui Defeng, Standard, and Nuopuxin names. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002217.SZ.summary: Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells components for smart terminals in China. It offers liquid crystal display modules, touch control modules, camera and fingerprint identification modules, cover glasses, RFPCB and flexible printed circuit boards, electronic paper eco-chain modules, backlight modules, and 5G materials, as well as components of wireless charging modules. The products are used in various fields, such as communication equipment, consumer electronics, household appliance, office equipment, digital products, automotive electronics and electric vehicles, finance, industrial control, medical device, smart wearable equipment, smart retail and smart home products. The company was formerly known as Shandong Liaherd Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2014. Holitech Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Zibo, China.

002226.SZ.long_name: Anhui Jiangnan Chemical Industry Co., Ltd.
002226.SZ.summary: Anhui Jiangnan Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. researches, produces, and sells explosives in China. The company offers explosives, including emulsion, powdery emulsion, expanded ammonium nitrate, and modified ammonium explosives; and on-site mixed explosives, such as porous ammonium, mixed emulsion, and heavy ammonium fry explosives. It also provides explosive products comprising source columns, detonating cords, and detonating tube detonators. In addition, the company offers engineering blasting services, which include mine, tunnel, earth and stone, and demolition blasting services; and blasting products, such as emulsifiers, polycrystalline diamonds, nano cerium oxide, and explosive compounds. Further, it develops, constructs, and operates wind farms and photovoltaic power plants. Anhui Jiangnan Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Hefei, China.

002233.SZ.summary: Guangdong Tapai Group Co., Ltd. offers cement and concrete products in China. Its products are used in the industrial and civil buildings, concrete and underground engineering, high-rise buildings, roads and bridges, airport runways, and port terminals. The company is based in Meizhou, China.

002235.SZ.summary: Xiamen Anne Corporation Limited engages in the digital copyright and marketing, business information paper, and lottery marketing businesses in China. It offers online copyright services; and professional services for digital content, integrated social media operation, and marketing and value-added services on intellectual property of content, as well as provides services on e-commerce promotion, Internet marketing, Internet operation, brand marketing, and PR scheme based on professional analysis of market. The company also specializes in supplying and servicing of national lottery manufactures and paperless lottery sales. In addition, it offers business information papers, such as POS papers, commercial bills, logistics and product labels, copy papers, fax papers, computer printing papers, ink-jet papers, photo papers, and other office papers, as well as lottery invoices and other commercial papers under the Anne, King, Little Mars, Tropical fish, Bright Color, Thanks, Jinhao, Yahao, Style, POS, Fuzhi, and Furi brand names. The company is based in Xiamen, China.

002237.SZ.summary: Shandong Humon Smelting Co., Ltd. engages in the exploration, mining, selection, and smelting of gold in China. It also produces silver, cathode copper, electrolytic lead, vitriol, and liquid sulfur dioxide. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Yantai, China.

002240.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Chengxin Lithium Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells fiberboard products in China. The company provides medium (high) density fiberboards used in furniture, door, and reinforcement Wood flooring, and decoration industries. It is also involved in forest planting and sales activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002250.SZ.summary: Lianhe Chemical Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, markets, and sells chemical products in China. It offers crop protection products, performance chemicals, and pharmaceuticals. The company also provides a range of engineering services and equipment manufacturing services. Lianhe Chemical Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

002254.SZ.long_name: Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co., Ltd.
002254.SZ.summary: Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of high-tech fibers in China. The company offers Newstar Spandex, a polyurethane elastic fiber that is used in underwear, socks, tights, sportswear, swimwear, laces, and suits, as well as in medical and hygiene textiles, and automotive interiors. It also provides Newstar Meta-aramid, an aromatic polyamide fiber, which is used in aerospace, high-speed trains, firefighter apparels, training uniforms, work wear, environmental protection, industrial high-temperature materials, automobile hoses, senior sound dampers, electrical insulation, and other areas. In addition, the company offers Taparan Para-aramid fibers for use in various applications, including rubber tube structures, strengthening fabrics, tire cords, packing, sealing, optical cable reinforcement, etc.; Tametar anti-static fibers for use in 3T fabric, industrial filtration, and anti-static fabric applications; and Metastar Aramid papers. The company was formerly known as Yantai Spandex Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. in September 2011. Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Yantai, China.

002258.SZ.summary: Lier Chemical Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of agrochemical products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers chloropyridine, organophosphate, sulphonylurea, and substituted urea type, as well as low-toxicity, low-residue safe pesticides. It also provides herbicides, including glufosinate-ammonium, diquat, flumioxazin, clodinafop-propargyl, clopyralid, fluroxypyr-meptyl, triclopyr, diuron, bensulfuron-methyl, linuron, pyrazosulfuron-ethyl, nicosulfuron, flufenacet, mefenacet, and quinclorac; fungicides, such as epoxiconazole, iprodione, and difenoconazole; and insecticides comprising chlorpyrifos and pyriproxyfen, as well as active pharmaceutical ingredients and preparations. In addition, the company offers chemical intermediates, including 2-chloropyridine; 2,3-dichloropyridine; 2,5-dichloropyridine; 2,6-dichloropyridine; 2,3,4-trichloropyridine; 2,3,5-trichloropyridine; 2,3,6-trichloropyridine; nitrapyrin; pentafluoropyridine; 2,3,5,6-tetrachloro-4-methylsulfonylpyridine; 6-chloropyridine-2-carbonitrile; 3,6-difluoropyridine-2-carboxylic acid; 2,2'-bipyridine; 2-chloro-4'-fluoroacetophenone; 2-chloro-2',4'-difluoroacetophenone; and 2-fluoro-3-nitrobenzoic acid. Further, its intermediates comprise (E)-4-(dimethylamino)but-2-enoic acid hydrochloride; 4,4'-dichloro-[3,3']bipyridinyl; clopyralid-methyl; methyl 3,4,6-trichloropicolinate; 2,4,5-trichloropyridine; 7-fluoro-6-nitro-4-hydroxyquinazoline; N-(3-chloro-4-fluorophenyl)-7-fluoro-6-nitroquinazolin-4-amine; 4-bromocrotonic acid; 4-N-(3-chloro-4-fluorophenyl)-7-[(3S)-oxolan-3-yl]oxyquinazoline-4,6-diamine; 2-amino-N-(2-chloro-6-methylphenyl)-1,3-thiazole-5-carboxamide; and 5-chloro-8-hydroxyquinoline. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Mianyang, the People's Republic of China.

002274.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huachang Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells agrochemicals, basic chemicals, fine chemicals, and biochemical products in China. Its products include compound fertilizers, carbamide, industrial sodium carbonate, ammonium chloride, liquid anhydrous ammonia, nitric acids, industrial methyl alcohol, sodium and potassium borohydride, trimethyl borate, hexamethyleneimine, 1,2-propanediol, light calcium silicate building blocks, and amino acids. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

002290.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Hesheng Special Material Co., Ltd.
002290.SZ.summary: Suzhou Hesheng Special Material Co., Ltd. produces and sells composite materials for household appliances in China and internationally. The company offers polyethylene terephthalate composite materials for use in appliances, including refrigerators, water heaters, air conditioners, microwave ovens, washing machines, range hoods, etc.; and decorative products, such as yacht and train interiors. It also provides VCM and PCM composite materials. Suzhou Hesheng Special Material Co., Ltd. is based in Suzhou, China.

002297.SZ.summary: Hunan Boyun New Materials Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells powder metallurgy composite materials in China.
