The company offers carbon/carbon composite and powder metallurgy products for use in aviation, aerospace, railway, automotive, metallurgy, chemical, shipbuilding, and construction machinery and other fields. It also provides powder metallurgy equipment. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Russia, and other CIS countries. Hunan Boyun New Materials Co.,Ltd is based in Changsha, China.

002318.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jiuli Hi-Tech Metals Co., Ltd.
002318.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jiuli Hi-Tech Metals Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stainless steel pipes and tubes worldwide. Its products include austenitic stainless steel pipes/tubes, duplex stainless steel, corrosion and high temperature resistant alloys, ferritic stainless steel, precipitation hardening stainless steel, clad/lined pipes, titanium alloys, and pipe fittings. The company's products are used in civil nuclear power, thermal/hydro electric generation, oil and gas, refinery, chemical, offshore engineering and shipbuilding, seawater desalination and water treatment, natural gas, and instrumentation tubing industries, as well as aerospace, auto, fertilizer, chemical fiber, pulp and paper, food, etc. industries. Zhejiang Jiuli Hi-Tech Metals Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

002319.SZ.summary: Letong Chemical Co.,LTD researches, develops, produces, and sells medium and high-end ink coatings in China. The company offers cigarette packing, UV, printing, PVC and aluminum foil, water-based, and anti-counterfeit specialty inks, as well as composite watches. It also provides powder, automotive, and plastic coatings; and printing spray solutions. The company also exports its products. Letong Chemical Co.,LTD was founded in 1996 and is based in Zhuhai, China.

002324.SZ.summary: Shanghai PRET Composites Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells modified plastic products primarily for automobiles in China. The company offers toughened, reinforced, and filling modified polypropylene; high impact-resisting, medium heat-resisting and impact-resisting, high heat-resisting, low-gloss, electroplating grade, and blow molding grade acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene (ABS); and weather resistance, low-gloss, conventional, electroplating, and high-flow polycarbonate and ABS, as well as liquid crystal polymers and other materials. It also serves communication, engineering, electrical, and other industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002326.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of fluorinated aromatic chemicals in China. It offers intermediates of cardiovascular, anti-diabetes, nervous system, anti-infection, and anti-virus pharmaceuticals, as well as pharmaceutical raw materials and preparations; agrochemical products, such as fluorinated intermediates of herbicides, fungicides, and insecticides; and electric chemical products, which include fluorinated monocrystal intermediates, lithium hexafluorophospate, and lithium bisimide for lithium batteries, as well as monocrystals and color filters for tablet display, etc. The company also provides APIs; and engages in the wholesale and retail of pesticide formulations. It serves chemical sub-industries, such as liquid crystals, pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, etc. The company also sells its products to the United States, the European Union, Japan, and India. Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Linhai, China.

002333.SZ.summary: ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aluminum alloy profiles in China and internationally. The company offers aluminum doors and windows, apparel, industrial profiles, special alloy profiles, curtain walls, energy-saving curtains, accessories, and project cases, as well as aluminum alloy casting rods and other products. Its products are applied in construction, cycles, photovoltaic solar energy, LED lighting, elevator decoration, rail transportation, machinery and chemical industry, electronics, aerospace, automotive, indoor and outdoor furniture, heat exchange systems, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. in December 2020. ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002341.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Selen Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002341.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Selen Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of new materials in China. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, South America, Southeast Asia, and internationally. It offers double-sided tapes, optical tapes, protective films, functional tapes, TAC products, graphite sheets, and aluminum-plastic composite films. The company also provides electronic/pharmaceutical/food industry clean-room engineering design, construction, and maintenance integrated solution; ultra clean products research, production, and sales integration services; and clean room products, such as clean-room apparels, clean-room consumables, purification apparatus, air filters, lithium battery package materials, and consumables. In addition, it offers personal care products, including regenerated cellulose long fiber non-woven fabrics; and plastic packages, plastic molds, and blowing molds for use in medical, medical apparatus and instruments, chemical, and other fields. The company serves information technology, consumer electronics, new energy, petroleum refinement, biopharmaceutical, food, daily chemical, automobile manufacturing, and aerospace. Shenzhen Selen Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002360.SZ.summary: Shanxi Tond Chemical Co., Ltd. researches, produces, sells, imports, and exports civil explosives, silica products, and on-site mixed explosives in China. The company offers ammonium nitrate explosives, emulsified explosives, and ammonium fry; and white carbon black for ordinary rubber products, white carbon black for tires, carrier silica, silicone for silica rubber, silica aerosol, silica thickening and thixotropic agents, silica for coatings, inkjet silica, and silica matting agents. It also provides engineering blasting services. The company is based in Xinzhou, China.

002361.SZ.summary: Anhui Shenjian New Materials Co.,Ltd engages in researching, producing, and selling saturated polyester resins for powder coatings in chemical materials field in China. The company offers hybrid polyester resins; outdoor polyester resins, including resins for TGIC and Primid powder coating; and PU resins. Anhui Shenjian New Materials Co.,Ltd is based in Wuhu, China.

002377.SZ.summary: Hubei Guochuang Hi-tech Material Co., Ltd engages in the real estate intermediary service business and the research, development, production, and sale of modified and emulsified asphalt in China. The company offers SBS modified, high viscosity modified, rubber, colored, and retardant asphalt; and high modulus asphalt mixture additives, emulsified asphalt and modified emulsified asphalt, cement asphalt mortars, asphalt pavement regeneration reductants, asphalt pavement waterproof and oilrepellent agents, bridge preventive curing coating materials, and epoxy asphalt steel bridge maintenance materials. It is also undertakes road maintenance projects. In addition, the company provides road engineering maintenance equipment includes micro-surfacing, sand fog sealing layer, ultra-thin wear layer, synchronous gravel sealing, reclaimed asphalt pavement, warm asphalt pavement, cold repair, and snow melting anti-icing equipment. Hubei Guochuang Hi-tech Material Co.,Ltd is based in Wuhan, China.

002378.SZ.summary: Chongyi Zhangyuan Tungsten Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, beneficiation, smelting, and powder producing activities in China. It offers APTs, tungsten oxide, tungsten powders, tungsten carbide powders, inserts, rods, buttons, and special parts under the Zhangyuan brand. The company is also involved in tungsten alloy and cemented carbide producing; and deep processing and trading activities. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Ganzhou, China.

002379.SZ.long_name: Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited
002379.SZ.summary: Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited develops, manufactures, and sells aluminum finishing products in China. The company offers aluminum plates, strips, and foils. It provides container aluminum foils for packing boxes; household aluminum foils that are used in food packing; flexible packaging foils for food packaging after lamination; and beer sealing aluminum foils. The company also offers fin-stock aluminum foils for use in air conditioners; and pharmaceutical aluminum foils, which are used in pharmaceutical packing, including ptp flexible pharmaceutical packing. It also exports its products to Europe, North America, Australia, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Loften Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited in May 2017. Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Binzhou, China.

002386.SZ.summary: Yibin Tianyuan Group Co., Ltd. produces and distributes chlor-alkali chemicals in China and internationally. Its products include chlorine products, such as ion exchange membrane method sodium hydroxide, liquid chlorine, synthetic industrial hydrochloric acid, trichloroethylene, tetrachloroethylene, artificial rutile, and industrial calcium chloride; PVC products comprising suspension polyvinyl chloride resins; and fine chemical products consisting of hydrazine hydrate and technical grade sodium tripolyphosphate. The company also comprise pipe fittings and plate products, such as PVC-O water supply pipes, PVC drains, PVC electrical bushings, PE gas pipes, PPR hot and cold water pipes, wood plastic products, and upscale ecological interior floor products; building materials, including Portland cement; and calcium carbide. The company is based in Yibin, China.

002391.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Changqing Agrochemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pesticides in China, Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. Its technical materials comprise fomesafen, acifluorfen, fluoroglycofen-ethyl, lactofen, clomazone, imazethapyr, bromoxynil octanoate, nicosulfuron, benazolin-ethyl, clethodim, tricyclazole, fenoxanil, imidacloprid, acetamiprid, diafenthiuron, mesotrione, s-metolachlor, clodinafop-propargyl, dicamba, indoxacarb, fipronil, thiamethoxam, indoxacarb technical concentrate, clethodim mother liquor, cyhalofop-butyl active compound, prosulfuron active compound, pretilachlor active compound, azoxystrobin active compound, glyphosate active compound, chlorpyrifos active compound, triazophos, dimethazone, and triasulfuron active compound materials; and formulations include insecticides, bactericides, and herbicides. The company is based in Yangzhou, China.

002398.SZ.summary: Lets Holdings Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of construction materials in China and internationally. It provides concrete manufacturing and construction services for the nuclear power, high-speed rail, subway, water conservancy, and other projects, as well as for ports, bridges, tunnels, and highways. The company also offers technical construction services, such as surveying, designing, testing, evaluation, consulting, and training for the life cycle of engineering feasibility study, construction, and operation and maintenance. In addition, it provides information and intelligent services for the Chinese construction industry; Internet-based industry supply chain big data services; and BIM- based building information and industrialization of intelligent system services. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Academy Of Building Research Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lets Holdings Group Co., Ltd. in October 2019. Lets Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Xiamen, China.

002408.SZ.long_name: Zibo Qixiang Tengda Chemical Co., Ltd
002408.SZ.summary: Zibo Qixiang Tengda Chemical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and markets various chemical products in China. Its products include methyl ethyl ketone, isobutylene, maleic anhydride, disproportioated products, butadiene rubber, and carboxyl styrene butadiene latex, as well as tert-butanol and MTBE products. The company also exports its products to the United States, Japan, Canada, South Korea, and India. The company is based in Zibo, China.

002411.SZ.summary: YanAn Bicon Pharmaceutical Listed Company researches and develops, produces, and sells pharmaceutical intermediates, pesticide intermediates, and new energy and materials products in China. It offers medical products under the Weizheng and DoctorBaby brands. The company also provides lithium hexafluorophate, a material of lithium battery electrolytes for use in anti-cutting gloves, and military and defense equipment, as well as aerospace composites, ocean vessels, naval vessel ropes, deep-sea fishing trawls, deep-sea anti-wave cages, sports equipment supplies, construction engineering reinforcements, and other high performance composites. In addition, it offers drug intermediates, such as 7-ADCA; trichloropyridin-2-Ol sodium; 5,5-dimethylhydantoin; and benzaldehyde. The company was formerly known as JiangSu Bicon Pharmaceutical Listed Company and changed its name to YanAn Bicon Pharmaceutical Listed Company in October 2018. YanAn Bicon Pharmaceutical Listed Company was founded in 2007 and is based in Nantong, China.

002418.SZ.summary: Zhe Jiang Kangsheng Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells refrigeration piping systems and new energy vehicle parts in China. The company offers steel tubes, aluminum tubes, copper tubes, micro channel heat exchangers, condensers, and evaporators; pure electric tourist buses, pure electric buses, pure electric logistics vehicles, pure electric touring cars, and pure electric airport shuttle buses; and financing lease, small loans, and other financial services. It also provides aluminum sheets, air conditioning parts, and microchannel heat exchangers. Zhe Jiang Kangsheng Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Chun'an, China.

002428.SZ.long_name: Yunnan Lincang Xinyuan Germanium Industry Co.,LTD
002428.SZ.summary: Yunnan Lincang Xinyuan Germanium Industry Co.,LTD mines, researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies tantalum products. It offers tantalum material products, such as district melting ingots, cerium oxide, and fiber-optic cerium tetrachloride used in infrared optics, solar cells, fiber optic communications, semiconductor specialty gases, PET catalysts, and other industries. The company also provides solar tantalum substrate, including solar germanium wafers used in space satellite solar cell, high-altitude surveillance drones, and ground high-concentration solar power stations; LED substrates for automotive applications; and semiconductor grade and semi-insulator gallium arsenide crystals and substrates used in nanoscale semiconductor integrated circuits and LED general illumination fields comprising microwave oscillators and amplifiers, fiber optic communication rate amplifiers, and other fields. In addition, it offers cooling and non-cooling infrared lenses consisting of fixed-focus lenses, continuous zoom lenses, and dual-field lenses, large diameter single crystals, infrared optical banks, optical grade germanium crystals, plastic optical components, and light windows. The company is based in Kunming, China.

002440.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Runtu Co., Ltd. produces and sells dyes in China. It provides approximately 300 types of chemicals in dye, pigment, and additive categories. The company offers disperse, reactive, direct, blend, cationic, and vat dyes; and chemical intermediate products, textile auxiliaries, sodium hydrosulfite, sulfuric acid, and chlorinate alkali. It provides its products under the RUNTU, LONGYU, DRAGONPERS, RUIHUAZOL, and JIACHEN brand names. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Shangyu, China.

002442.SZ.summary: Longxing Chemical Stock Co., Ltd. produces and sells carbon black products under the Longxing brand in China. The company offers carbon black, precipitated silica, and polyvinylidene fluoride products. Its carbon black is used as reinforcing filler in all-steel, semi-steel radial tires, and inner tubes; used for auto parts, including sealing strips of doors and windows, oil tubes, dampers and brake pads, etc.; and serves as an ingredient in rubber, building materials, electronics, papers, plastics, color masterbatches, paints, fuels, chemical fibers, fiber coloring, printing ink, ink and papermaking, etc. The company also produces electricity, plastic woven products, and iron ore, as well as other products from coal tar deep processing. The company was formerly known as Hebei Longxing Chemical Stock Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Longxing Chemical Stock Co., Ltd. in January 2008. Longxing Chemical Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shahe, China.

002443.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co.,Ltd.
002443.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells oil and gas pipelines, and civilian pipelines in China. The company's principal products include hot-dip galvanized/black pipes, lined or PE coated GAL pipes, coated pipes, epoxy primer pre-coated hot-dip galvanized pipes, helical submerged-arc welded pipes, high frequency welded pipes, FBE/2PE/3PE coated pipes, PP-R/PE pipes, and fittings, as well as SAWL and HFW pipes. It provides products for use in oil and natural gas transportation pipeline projects, mine slurry and mine powder transportation line pipes, undersea line pipes, heating power pipeline projects, urban water supply and drainage projects, oil well casing pipes, extra high voltage power steel pipe towers, refining pipeline projects, and underground of urban gas steel pipelines. The company also offers 3PP/3PE/FBE coated pipes, internal coated pipes, ERW, PE gas pipes, PE water pipes, PP-R water pipes, and fittings for use in the municipal and architectural water supply and drainage, city gas transportation, rural water irrigation, electric power field, communication field, chemistry industry, medicine field, etc. In addition, it provides submerged arc welded longitudinal pipes for use in media transportation, including land/marine oil, gas, chemical, coal slurry, ore pulp, water, etc., as well as in offshore platform, power plant, chemical industry, building, bridge, structures, and others. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries. Zhejiang Kingland Pipeline and Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Huzhou, China.

002450.SZ.long_name: Kangde Xin Composite Material Group Co., Ltd.
002450.SZ.summary: Kangde Xin Composite Material Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of advanced polymer materials in China and internationally. The company offers laminating film materials, including graphic products, cultural and creative design, image design, printing and packaging, eco laminating materials and laminating equipment, and electronic display products; and prisms, diffusers, cd-free QD films, blue-light transfer films, anti-blue light films, OLED tapes, and vehicle display materials. It also provides hard coating films, protective films, special adhesive tapes, and ITO films; optical insulation film products; carbon fiber decorative films, high performance PDLC films, and other products; materials for flexible displays; capacitive touch screens; and BOPET substrates, self-adhesive protective films, and optical film substrates. In addition, the company develops smart high definition glasses-free 3D display technology. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Kangde Xin Composite Material Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kangde Xin Composite Material Group Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Kangde Xin Composite Material Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002453.SZ.summary: Great Chinasoft Technology Co.,Ltd. operates as a financial technology company. It offers next generation banking solutions, intelligent product fusion solutions, enterprise mobility solutions, and open solutions. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Tianma Specialty Chemicals Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Great Chinasoft Technology Co.,Ltd. in June 2018. Great Chinasoft Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002455.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Baichuan High-Tech New Materials Co., Ltd
002455.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Baichuan High-Tech New Materials Co., Ltd. produces and sells fine chemical products in China and internationally. Its products include acetates, acid anhydrides, plasticizer, polyatomic alcohols, insulating resins, and enamel wire paints, as well as propylene glycol ether and its esters. The company offers acetic ester products, such as n-butyl acetate, ethyl acetate, and propyl acetate; trimellitic anhydride and trioctyl trimellitate; trimethylolpropane, di-trimethylolpropane, and sodium formate; and glycol ether products, including propylene glycol monomethyl ether, propylene glycol monomethyl ether acetate, 2-methoxy-1-propanol, 2-methoxy-1-propanol acetate, and dipropylene glycol methyl ether. Its products have applications in various fields, such as paintings, cementing compounds, pharmaceutical and medical treatment, household appliances, carpentry furniture, finishing and decoration, toys for children, package printing, industrial equipment, road marking, etc. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Baichuan Chemical Industrial Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Jiangsu Baichuan High-Tech New Materials Co., Ltd. in March 2018. Jiangsu Baichuan High-Tech New Materials Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, China.

002460.SZ.summary: Ganfeng Lithium Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lithium products in Mainland China, Hong Kong, rest of Asia, the European Union, North America, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Lithium Metal and Compound, Lithium Battery, and Lithium Ore Resource and Others. The company has interests in the Mount Marion mine located in Australia; Cauchari-Olaroz project situated in Jujuy Province, Northwest Argentina; Mariana project located in the Andes Mountains in Salta Province, Argentina; Sonora project situated in Mexico; Pilbara Pilgangoora lithium-tantalum project located in Western Australia; Ningdu Heyuan mine situated in Ningdu County, Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province; and Avalonia project located in Ireland. It offers battery grade lithium carbonate, battery-grade lithium hydroxide, lithium chloride, butyl lithium, and lithium fluoride; lithium metals in the form of ingots, foils, rods, particles, alloy powder; polymer lithium battery; and lithium-ion motive power batteries, energy storage batteries, and consumer batteries, as well as copper lithium or lithium aluminum alloy foil. The company also explores for and sells lithium ores; and provides lithium battery recycling solutions. Its products are used in the manufacturing of electric vehicles, portable electronics, chemicals, and pharmaceuticals, as well as used by battery cathode materials manufacturers, battery suppliers, and automobile original equipment manufacturers. Ganfeng Lithium Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Xinyu, China.

002466.SZ.summary: Tianqi Lithium Corporation, a new energy materials company, engages in the lithium resource investment, lithium concentrate extraction, and production of advanced lithium specialty compounds in Australia, Chile, and China. Its products include battery and industrial grade lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide monohydrate, lithium chloride anhydrous, and lithium metal. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002470.SZ.long_name: Kingenta Ecological Engineering Group Co., Ltd.
002470.SZ.summary: Kingenta Ecological Engineering Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of fertilizers in China and internationally. Its products include compound, slow/controlled-release, water soluble, bio, and other fertilizers; and chelated micronutrients. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Linshu, China.

002476.SZ.summary: Shandong Polymer Biochemicals Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells oilfield chemicals in China and internationally. The company offers monomers, surfactants, and polymers. It is also involved in oil and gas engineering technology services; oil and gas exploration and development; and environmental water treatment businesses. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Dongying, China.

002478.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Changbao Steeltube Co.,Ltd produces and sells various steel pipes and tubes primarily in the People's Republic of China. The company offers OCTG products for petroleum industry, including connection tubings and casings, coupling stocks, perforating gun carrier pipes, petroleum tool pipes, drill pipes, and slotted pipes; boiler tubes for power generation; steel tubes for auto industry comprising automobile precision tubes, piping for hydraulic cylinders, and axel tubes; petrochemical tubes, steel tubes for low temperature resistance, and high pressure fertilizer tubes; and steel tubes for engineering machinery industry, such as mechanical steel pipes, boom pipes, and piping for hydraulic cylinders. It also provides line pipes, geological drilling pipes, core barrels, rope corning drill pipe materials, gas cylinder pipes, and accumulator tubes, as well as steel pipes for marine engineering, structural purpose, and fluid transmission. The company exports its products to Europe, the Americas, the Middle East, CIS, Southeast Asia, Australia, Africa, and internationally. Jiangsu Changbao Steeltube Co.,Ltd was founded in 1958 and is based in Changzhou, China.

002493.SZ.summary: Rongsheng Petrochemical Co., Ltd. produces, markets, and sells petrochemicals, chemical fibers, and other related products in China and internationally. It offers synthetic fibers and films, including fiber and film grade polyester chips, bottle grade polyester chips, polyester pre-oriented yarns, draw textured yarns, fully drawn yarns, and PET films; synthetic raw materials, such as purified terephthalic acids, ethylene oxides, triethylene glycol, diethylene glycol, ethylene glycol, and P-xylene; and synthetic resins comprising ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymers, high density polyethylene, low-density polyethylene, and polypropylene. The company also provides olefins consisting of butene-1, hexene-1, butadiene, propylene, and ethylene; aromatics and phenols, including cumene, acetone, phenol, styrene, ethylbenzene, xylene, mixed aromatics, methylbenzene, and purified petroleum benzine; and acrylonitrile and special chemical products, such as dimethyl carbonate, methyl methacrylate, polycarbonate, bisphenol A, acetonitrile, and acrylonitrile. In addition, it offers intermediate and chemical raw materials comprising iso-butane, n-butane, petroleum cokes, liquid argons, liquid ammonia, methanol, liquid petroleum gas, isooctane, methyl tert-butyl ether, industrial hexane, pentane foamer, industrial aromatic hydrocarbons, high-flash aromatic naphthas, ethylene bottom oils, splitting decomposition C9 and C5, and sulphur; and oil products, such as jet fuels, diesel, and gasoline. The company was formerly known as Rongsheng Chemical Fiber Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rongsheng Petrochemical Co., Ltd. in September 2007. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Rongsheng Petrochemical Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Rongsheng Holding Group Co., Ltd.

002496.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd.
002496.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pesticides in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers pesticide, fertilizer, seed, medicine, and fine chemicals. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Huifeng Agrochemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Jiangsu Huifeng Bio Agriculture Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Yancheng, the People's Republic of China.

002497.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Yahua Industrial Group Co., Ltd.
002497.SZ.summary: Sichuan Yahua Industrial Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, produces, and sells civil explosive materials in China and internationally. It offers detonating equipment, including electronic, coal mine permissible millisecond electric, coal mine allowable instantaneous electric, and average delay electric detonators, as well as detonating tubes, plastic nonels, and ordinary detonating cords; and industrial explosives, such as rock expanded ammonium nitrate, rock emulsion, permissible emulsion, level 3 coal mine permissible emulsion, and powder emulsion explosives. The company also provides fine chemicals comprising powder composite oil phase, emulsion composite oil phase, emulsifier1, and emulsifying agent S80. In addition, it offers engineering blasting, transport of dangerous goods, and explosion working services, as well as lithium products and services consisting of lithium hydroxide monohydrate, clean lithium hydroxide monohydrate, lithium carbonate, and battery grade lithium carbonate. Its products are used in mining, hydraulic engineering, hydropower station, road construction, urban renewal, geological exploration, blasting processing, national defense, etc. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002501.SZ.long_name: Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
002501.SZ.summary: Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial and architectural aluminum profiles, special profiles, mechanical machining and assembling aluminum alloy parts, and railcar engine and body manufacturing parts in China. It also exports its products to 18 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Jilin Liyuan Aluminum Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in November 2013. Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Liaoyuan, China.

002513.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Lanfeng Bio-chemical Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, herbicides, and fine chemical intermediates in China and internationally. It offers thiophanate-methyl, cyclohexazone, benomyl, and carbendazim. The company is based in Xinyi, China.

002521.SZ.summary: Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells decorative base papers, overlay papers, non-woven wall base papers, and flicker overlay papers in China. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Shandong Qifeng Special Paper Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. in September 2013. Qifeng New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Zibo, China.

002538.SZ.summary: Anhui Sierte Fertilizer industry LTD. ,company produces and sells chemical fertilizers in China. It offers phosphate compound fertilizers, slow and controlled release fertilizers, soil testing formula fertilizers, ecological fertilizers, and inorganic fertilizers. The company is headquartered in Ningguo, China.

002539.SZ.summary: Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies chemicals in China and internationally. The company offers NPK fertilizers, soda ash, ammonium chloride, anhydrous sodium sulphate, and edible and industrial salts, as well as other products, including urea. The company was formerly known as Shindoo Chemi-Industry Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. in September 2016. Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002547.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Chunxing Precision Mechanical Co., Ltd.
002547.SZ.summary: Suzhou Chunxing Precision Mechanical Co., Ltd. produces and sells precise aluminum structure parts for telecom, automobile, industrial, medical, and consumer markets in China and internationally. It offers die casting products, such as filter bodies, robot housings, and heat sinks; sheet metal stampings, including adapting pieces, automobile seat frames, back DVD frames, automobile front seat frames, and automobile back seats; and automobile parts comprising handbrake connecting links, automobile cooling system bodies, seat belt reels, and wiper engine housings. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002549.SZ.summary: Hunan Kaimeite Gases Co., Ltd. produces and sells industrial gases in China. It engages in the research, development, production, and sale of dry ice, liquid additive, liquid carbon dioxide, methane, oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen, argon, helium, and other industrial gases that are widely used in beverage, metallurgy, food, tobacco, petroleum, agriculture, chemical, electronics, and other fields. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Yueyang, China.

002556.SZ.long_name: Anhui Huilong Agricultural Means of Production Co.,Ltd.
002556.SZ.summary: Anhui Huilong Agricultural Means of Production Co.,Ltd. provides fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds in China and internationally. It supplies its products through a network of distribution centers and 2,800 franchise stores. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Hefei, China.

002568.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Bairun Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd.
002568.SZ.summary: Shanghai Bairun Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of flavors and fragrances under the brand Bairun in China. Its products are used in beverage, dairy, confectionary, bakery, ice cream, savory, oral care, and tobacco products. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Bairun Flavor & Fragrance Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Bairun Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd. in December 2015. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002578.SZ.summary: Fujian Minfa Aluminium Co.,Ltd. processes and sells aluminum alloy extruded profiles for architecture and industry fields in the People's Republic of China. The company offers sliding, casement, and insulated windows and doors; railings and shutters; and curtain wall building profiles. It also provides industrial materials, including luggage, decorating, and stationery materials; opening, corner, and table top pipes; sliding pulleys, ladder materials, and fire hydrants; radiating fins; aluminum building formwork systems; aluminum panels; and color cards. The company also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. Fujian Minfa Aluminium Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanan City, the People's Republic of China.

002581.SZ.summary: Shandong Sinobioway Biomedicine Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies trimethyl orthoformate, triethyl orthoformate, trimethyl orthoacetate, phosphorous acid, ethyl formate, nerve growth factor, and alfaron in China. The company also provides NOBEX, a murine nerve growth factor for injection; Anferon, a human recombinant interferon alpha 2b injection; and Jaferon, a human recombinant interferon alpha 2b spray. In addition, it offers Healive, an inactivated hepatitis A vaccine; Bilive, a combined hepatitis A and B Vaccine; Panflu, a pandemic influenza vaccine; Anflu, a preservative-free influenza virus vaccine; Panflu.1, a Type A H1N1 influenza vaccine; etc. Further, the company exports its products to approximately 20 counties and regions in Europe and the United States. Shandong Sinobioway Biomedicine Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.

002584.SZ.summary: Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells chemical reagents in China. The company offers chemical reagents, PCB reagents, high purity reagents, food additives, active pharmaceutical and chemical materials, and lab glassware products. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Xilong Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Xilong Scientific Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Shantou, China.

002591.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Hengda Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells anti-wear and anti-corrosion materials for industrial equipment in China. The company offers acoustic noise reduction and environmental protection, and garbage stove anti-corrosion equipment. It is also involved in software and game, PC-side applications, and mobile APP distribution business. In addition, the company provides technical engineering services to anti-wear and anti-corrosion materials. Its products are used in power, steel, cement, petrochemical, subway, airport, stadium, and other industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

002596.SZ.long_name: Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd
002596.SZ.summary: Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd. produces and sells ready-mixed concrete and cement in China. It provides high performance concrete, dry-process cement, environmental-protection building materials, and landscape design and construction and sanitation services. The company was formerly known as Three Ya Ruize Concrete Distribution Company Limited and changed its name to Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd. in August 2008. Hainan RuiZe New Building Material Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Sanya, China.

002597.SZ.summary: Anhui Jinhe Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of fine and basic chemical products. Its products include acesulfame potassium, maltol, ethyl maltol, methyl cyclopentenolone, and sucralose; and basic chemical products, such as liquid ammonia, nitric acid, sulfuric acid, formaldehyde, melamine, pentaerythritol, diketene, neopentyl glycol, and pharmaceutical intermediates. The company's products are used in food, beverage, tobacco, brewery, cosmetics, and pharmaceuticals industries. Anhui Jinhe Industrial Co., Ltd. is based in Chuzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002601.SZ.summary: Lomon Billions Group Co., Ltd., an inorganic fine chemical company, manufactures and sells titanium dioxide pigments worldwide. The company offers titanium dioxide, zirconium, titanium sponge, sulfuric acid, and mineral products for use in indoor and outdoor paints, inks, plastics, paper, electronics, rubber, fibers, ceramics, enamels, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and sunscreen product applications. It provides its products under the Xuelian and Mang, as well as LOMON and BILLIONS brand names. The company was formerly known as Henan Billions Chemicals Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lomon Billions Group Co., Ltd. in February 2017. Lomon Billions Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jiaozuo, China.

002632.SZ.summary: Daoming Optics&Chemical Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells reflective materials in China and internationally. The company offers reflective sheeting and fabrics, vehicle conspicuity tapes, vehicle number plates, and safety garments. It also provides personal and road safety products, finished products, safety vests, release papers, and glass beads. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Yongkang, China.

002637.SZ.summary: Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of surfactants and oleo chemicals in China and internationally. The company offers stearic acid glycol ester, disodium laureth sulfosuccinate, fatty acid methyl ester sulfonic acid, alkylbenzene sulfonic acid, sodium linear alpha olefin sulfonate, sodium and ammonium lauryl sulfate, sodium and ammonium lauryl ether sulfate, and cocamidopropyl and dodecyl dimethyl betaine. It also provides coco fatty diethanol amide, cocofatty acid monoethanol amide, synthetic leather fatliquoring agents, sulphonated oil SHO and SS, condensed phospholipin, POE fatty acid monoethanol amide ether, leather degreasing agents, and guar hydroxy propyl dimethyl. In addition, it offers third-party testing services on food safety, environment, occupational health, and others. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Zanyu Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Zanyu Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002643.SZ.summary: Valiant Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical materials in China and internationally. It offers liquid crystal singles, which include alkenes, biphenyl, cyclohexane benzene, esters, and other fluoro-containing compounds; and liquid crystal intermediates comprising phenol, cyclohexanone, benzoic acids, cyclohexane acids, and halogenated aromatics structures, as well as PI monomers, PR monomers, organic light-emitting diode materials, and other fine chemicals. The company also provides molecular sieve, a material for use in the petroleum industry; and health-care materials, such as APIs and intermediates; and customized products. In addition, it offers LCD intermediates, OPC materials, and polyimide intermediates; and life sciences, fine chemicals, and diagnostics products. The company was formerly known as Yantai Valiant Fine Chemicals Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Valiant Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Valiant Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

002652.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Yangtze New Materials Co., Ltd.
002652.SZ.summary: Suzhou Yangtze New Materials Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells functional organic coated boards and substrates in China. The company offers organic coated boards for use in IT industry, food processing industry, hospitals, photovoltaic manufacturing, and other high-clean workshops and car partitions. Its products are also used to produce exterior parts of white household appliances, such as refrigerators, washing machines, and microwave ovens. In addition, the company's products are used in the electronic industrial workshops, radio/sonar laboratories, and special medical examination rooms. The company is based in Suzhou, China.

002659.SZ.long_name: Beijing Kaiwen Education Technology Co., Ltd.
002659.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zhongtai Bridge Steel Structure Co., Ltd. engages in the steel structure fabrication business in China. It fabricates large-scale bridge steel structures, ship blocks, and crane steelworks, as well as heavy steel sections for power plants, etc. The company is based in Jiangyin, China.

002666.SZ.summary: Guangdong Delian Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the automobile fine chemicals, automobile sales service, and automobile repair and maintenance businesses in China. It offers aftermarket products, such as motor oils, gearbox oils, power steering oils, coolant, and brake fluids, as well as car care products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

002669.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Kangda New Materials Group Co., Ltd.
002669.SZ.summary: Shanghai Kangda New Materials Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of adhesives and sealants in the People's Republic of China. It offers approximately 200 types of products, including epoxy adhesives, polyurethane adhesives, acrylate AB adhesives, cyanoacrylate adhesives, UV curing adhesives, silicon rubbers, anaerobic adhesives, butyl hot melt adhesives, industrial repair putty products, spray polyurea, and others. The company's products are primarily used in the fields of automotive assembly, engineering, plastic, maintenance and repair, loudspeaker assembling, wind and solar energy power plants, environmental packing, transportation, anti-corrosion, ports and mines, rubber conveyer belt repairing, elevator manufacturing, military equipment, mechanical equipment, electronic appliances, construction reinforcement, and others. In addition, it provides technical support and after-sale services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai KangDa New Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Kangda New Materials Group Co., Ltd. in September 2019. Shanghai Kangda New Materials Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

002675.SZ.summary: Yantai Dongcheng Pharmaceutical Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of biochemical API products in China. It offers heparin, chondroitin sulphate, and glucosamine series products, as well as marine collagen, hyaluronic acid, heparinoid, and cytochrome C for use in the therapeutic areas of cardiovascular, oncology, orthopaedics, anti-infection, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries and regions, including the United States, Germany, Austria, Japan, etc. Yantai Dongcheng Pharmaceutical Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Yantai, China.

002676.SZ.summary: Guangdong Sunwill Precising Plastic Co.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells air conditioner fans and engineering plastics primarily in China. Its products include cross flow fans, axial fans, centrifugal fans, plastic housings, PVC tubes, plastic molds, and various kinds of modified engineering plastics. The company also offers plastic products comprising auto parts, pipe parts, electric appliances, mold displays, and other products; micro irrigation equipment, such as filters, micro and spray nozzles, drip stoppers, and emitters; and plastic injection and assembly, and after-sale services. In addition, it provides cross-flow, axial-flow, and centrifugal fan blades, as well as fan housings for household, business, and vehicle air conditioners and plastic car parts; and electric machines and materials, sanitary products, pipeline parts, metal products, electric products, and packaging materials. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

002679.SZ.summary: Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co.,Ltd engages in the afforestation activities in China. The company manages forests; and engages in the green seedlings, sale of wood, and Chinese herbal medicine fields. It also provides bamboo and primary agriculture products; and invests in forestry and agriculture projects. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Sanming, China. Fujian Jinsen Forestry Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Fujian Jiangle Forestry Corporation.

002683.SZ.summary: Guangdong Hongda Blasting Co., Ltd. provides mine explosion integration services in China. It offers open-pit mine mining and stripping services, as well as undertakes underground mine plate construction and mining works. The company also researches and develops, produces, and manages civilian blasting equipment and technology, including emulsion explosives, ammonium nitrate explosives, industrial electric detonators, tube detonators, plastic detonating tube, and relay detonators. In addition, it provides engineering blasting services, such as chimney folding blasting and other blasting demolition services. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002709.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Tinci Materials Technology Co., Ltd.
002709.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Tinci Materials Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets lithium-ion battery materials in China. It offers electrolytes of li-ion battery, solvents, and lithium salts. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002716.SZ.long_name: Chenzhou City Jingui Silver Industry Co., Ltd.
002716.SZ.summary: Chenzhou City Jingui Silver Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, smelting, processing, and export of silver in China. It primarily offers high-purity silver and silver products, high-purity silver nitrates, electrolytic leads, crude leads, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Chenzhou, China.

002734.SZ.summary: Limin Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets fungicides and other pesticides in China. The company offers various pesticide technical materials and preparations, such as mancozeb, cymoxanil, fosetyl-aluminum, propineb, pyrimethanil, propiconazole, difenoconazole, chlorothalonil, thiacloprid, metham sodium, Zineb, etc. It sells its products in approximately 70 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Limin Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Limin Group Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Limin Group Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Xinyi, China.

002738.SZ.summary: Sinomine Resource Group Co., Ltd. operates as a geological exploration technology services company in nonferrous metals industry. The company offers solid mineral exploration technical services for copper, lead, zinc, nickel, cobalt, gold, silver, platinum, and other non-ferrous metals. It also holds interests in the Shivuma copper project in Zambia, Perlat copper project in Albania, and Chromite project in Zimbabwe, as well as explores for gold, silver, cobalt, lead, zinc, iron, nickel, and uranium deposits. In addition, the company undertakes engineering projects; and provides related and extending services for oversea resources exploration, including exploration material production, storage, and freight. It has operations in China, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Malaysia, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Canada, Albania, Indonesia, Uganda, Papua New Guinea, Laos, the Philippines, Afghanistan, Pakistan, and Turkey. The company was formerly known as Sinomine Resource Exploration Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sinomine Resource Group Co., Ltd. in August 2018. Sinomine Resource Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

002741.SZ.summary: Guangdong Guanghua Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. produces and sells electronic chemicals, chemical reagents, and other specialty chemicals in China. The company offers copper nitrate, copper carbonate basic, cupric pyrophosphate, copper oxide, copper chloride, copper sulfate pentahydrate, nickel carbonate basic, nickel acetate, nickel chloride hexahydrat, nickel sulfamate solution, nickel sulfate hexahydrate, tin sulfate, sodium stannate trihydrate, potassium stannate trihydrate, tin chloride dihydrate, tin methanesulfonate solution, cobalt sulfamate solution, cobalt sulfate, cobalt acetate, cobalt nitrate, cobalt chloride, and potassium pyrophosphate. It also provides nickel sulfate, manganese sulfate monohydrate, cobalt sulfate, ternary precursor, lithium iron phosphate, lithium manganese iron phosphate, and ironic phosphate; plating additives; pcb solutions; oxide/peroxidate, inorganic acid, etc.; salts of organic acids, hydrocarbon/ substituted hydrocarbons, alcohol/ phenol/ether/ketone, nitrile/amine/urea, etc.; and biochemical reagent, chromatographic reagent, pH and redox indicator, photochemistry and electrochemical analysis reagent, etc. The company serves printed circuit board, energy materials, auto parts, electronic components, medicine, chemical, bathroom hardware, research and development, and e-commerce industries. It exports its products to Southeast Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shantou Guanghua Chemical Factory Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Guanghua Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. in 2010. Guangdong Guanghua Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002742.SZ.summary: Chongqing Sansheng Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of building materials and chemicals in China. The company offers commercial concrete, water reducing agents, and expansion agents for industrial and civil buildings, highways, railways, bridges, tunnels, airports, water conservancy and hydropower, etc.; and sulfuric acid for the production of chemical fertilizers, chemical, light industry, textile, steel, water reducer, and other non-fertilizer acid enterprises. It also provides pharmaceutical products comprising intermediates, such as procaine hydrochloride, cefoxitin intermediate, chloramphenicol intermediate, aztreonam intermediate, orlistat intermediate, etc., which are used in antibiotic drugs, anti-hepatitis C drugs, diabetes medicines, benzathine penicillin and cefoxitin, procaine penicillin, and cosmetics; API products, including acetaminophen, cloperidine hydrochloride, levofloxacin mesylate, benoate, procaine hydrochloride, diphenhydramine hydrochloride, etc.; and preparation products, such as compound paracetamol diphenhydramine, cloperidine hydrochloride, clarithromycin sustained-release, diclofenac sodium enteric-coated, acetaminophen, famotidine tablets, etc., which are used in antipyretic and analgesic, antiviral, antibacterial, cough, allergy, local anesthesia, etc., as well as famotidine, diclofenac sodium, nifedipine, acetaminophen, furosemide, and norfloxacin drugs for clinical needs. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Sansheng Special Building Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chongqing Sansheng Industrial Co.,Ltd. in October 2016. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Chongqing, China.

002743.SZ.long_name: Anhui Fuhuang Steel Structure Co., Ltd.
002743.SZ.summary: Anhui Fuhuang Steel Structure Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production, installation, and general contracting of steel structures, and doors and windows. The company is headquartered in Chaohu, China.

002748.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Selon Industrial Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, markets, and sells fine chemicals in China, Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan. It offers AC foaming agents, thionyl chloride, chlor-alkali, and other chemical products, as well as industrial sodium hydroxide, liquid chlorine, synthetic hydrochloric acid, and aqueous ammonia. The company also exports its products to approximately 10 countries, including Southeast Asia, South Korea, Turkey, Italy, the United States, etc. Jiangxi Selon Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Leping, China.

002749.SZ.summary: Sichuan Guoguang Agrochemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and distribution of agrochemical products and materials in China. Its products include plant growth regulators, fertilizers, fungicides, insecticides, bio-pesticide, and herbicides. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002753.SZ.long_name: Shanxi Yongdong Chemistry Industry Co., Ltd.
002753.SZ.summary: Shanxi Yongdong Chemistry Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells carbon black and fine chemical products in China. The company is based in Yuncheng, China.

002756.SZ.long_name: Yongxing Special Materials Technology Co., Ltd.
002756.SZ.summary: Yongxing Special Materials Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells nickel alloys and stainless steel products in China and internationally. The company offers austenitic and duplex stainless steel round bars; stainless steel wire rods; and special alloys, including iron ultratek, ultratek, precision, and stainless steel alloys. Its products are primarily used in petrochemical, high-pressure boiler, nuclear power energy, equipment manufacturing, aerospace, and other industrial fields. The company was formerly known as Yongxing Special Stainless Steel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yongxing Special Materials Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2019. Yongxing Special Materials Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Huzhou, China.

002783.SZ.long_name: Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd.
002783.SZ.summary: Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of explosive materials in China. The company offers civil explosive; nano-calcium carbonate; nitro compound fertilizers; ammonium nitrate; and paper plastic packaging products. It also engages in the engineering blasting business. Hubei Kailong Chemical Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Jingmen, China.

002802.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Honghui New Materials Technology Co., Ltd.
002802.SZ.summary: Wuxi Honghui New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of copolymer and terpolymer resins of vinyl chloride and vinyl acetate, vinyl chloride terpolymer emulsion, and other modified water-based series worldwide. It offers vinyl copolymer, carboxyl modifed vinyl terpolymer, ester-soluble vinyl copolymer, and hydroxyl modified vinyl terpolymer resins; acrylic emulsion, water-based acrylic resins, epoxy emulsion, vinyl chloride copolymer emulsion, and epoxy hardener resins; and PVC functional modifier resins. The company's products are used in inks, coatings, plastic processing, magnetic record materials, adhesion, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.

002805.SZ.summary: Shandong Fengyuan Chemical Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells industrial oxalic acid, refined oxalic acid, and oxalate products in China and internationally. It also provides industrial sodium nitrate, nitric acid, electronic grade oxalic acid, potassium tetrasodium oxalate, potassium oxalate, and lithium iron phosphate. Shandong Fengyuan Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Zaozhuang, China.

002809.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Redwall New Materials Co., Ltd.
002809.SZ.summary: Guangdong Redwall New Materials Co., Ltd. produces and sells concrete admixtures in China and internationally. It offers polycarboxylates, polycarboxylate superplasticizers, polynaphthalene sulfonate sodium salts, and polycarboxylate sodium salts. The company is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

002824.SZ.summary: Guangdong Hoshion Aluminium Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells industrial aluminum profiles. The company offers consumer electronics, such as OPC and driven rollers for copier printers; power bank housing products; extrusion profiles for mobile phones; aluminum for TV frames; electronic products extrusion materials; arm of computer hard disc; seamless pipes for lens; and photographic equipment. It also provides automobile anti-collision beams; automobile slide rail for skylight; high precision large sectional rectangle pipes; colied pipesinner thread pipes; and forging parts. In addition, the company offers seamless pipes for baseball bars; kitchen and bathroom components; aluminum used baby trolley; aluminum for bicycle; extrusion profiles for flashlight and vacuum products; aluminum used lighting and snow shoes; electric heating tubes; and conditioner frames. Guangdong Hoshion Aluminium Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

002827.SZ.summary: Tibet GaoZheng Explosive Co., Ltd. produces and sells civilian explosives in China. The company offers powdered emulsion explosives and emulsion gel explosives. It also engages in the transportation and distribution of dangerous goods, general cargo transportation and distribution, loading and unloading and transportation agents, cargo storage management, vehicle repair and maintenance, etc. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Lhasa, China.

002838.SZ.summary: Shandong Dawn Polymer Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells modified plastics and thermoplastic elastomers. The company offers automobile material, flame retardant plastic, flame retardant reinforced plastic, glass fiber reinforced plastic, plastic alloy, high-melt woven plastic, filler masterbatch, color masterbatch, and special engineering plastic products. Its products are used in automobile, military, electronic, and aviation industry fields. The company also supplies FAW, DFM, CMCC, ISZU, Hair, Hisense, Joyoung, and home appliances manufacturer products. It has operations in China, Europe, East South of Asia, and South Africa. The company is based in Longkou, China.

002842.SZ.summary: Guangdong Xianglu Tungsten Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of tungsten products in China. Its products include tungsten trioxide, blue tungsten oxide, tungsten powder, tungsten carbide powder, and cemented carbide; and hard alloy. The company also exports its products. Guangdong Xianglu Tungsten Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Chaozhou, China.

002859.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jiemei Electronic And Technology Co., Ltd.
002859.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jiemei Electronic And Technology Co., Ltd. provides consumable materials of electronic components. Its principal products include un-punched paper tapes, pre-punched paper tapes, press pocket paper tapes, top and bottom tapes, embossed tapes and its covers, and release films. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

002886.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co., Ltd
002886.SZ.summary: Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, trades in, and services polymer materials and engineering plastic products in China and internationally. The company offers PES, PEEK, and LCP high temperature materials; aramid products; carbon-fiber reinforced materials; wear resistant lubricated materials; carbon black powder reinforced electronic conductive products; high gloss spray-free materials; nano-composite materials; and modified PPO, PC, and PC/ABS series materials. Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002895.SZ.summary: Guizhou Chanhen Chemical Corporation produces and markets phosphate products in China. The company offers industrial grade and food grade phosphoric acids, monocalcium phosphate feed additives, phosphorus gypsum building materials, and fire protective ammonium phosphate and polyphosphate products. It also provides fertilizers, such as ammonium polyphosphate, customized specification, ammonium phosphate, monoammonium phosphate, and monopotassium phosphate products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Fuquan, China.

002909.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Jointas Chemical Co., Ltd. produces and sells sealants and coatings in China. The company offers acetic silicone, door and window, structural, insulating glass, two-component, polyurethane, test, weather-proof, glass, and automobile/ship sealants, as well as sealants for construction and freight container applications. It also provides water-based latex and anti-corrosion paints, as well as asphalt undercoating products. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

002915.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhongxin Fluoride Materials Co., Ltd engages in the research, manufacture, and sale of fluorine fine chemicals in China. The company offers fluorine-containing cyanobenzene, benzoic acid, phenol, phenylcarbinol, phenylamine, nitrobenzene, and fluorine-containing arene series products, as well as acetophenone, heterocyclic ring, and other series products. Its fluorine chemicals cover medical intermediates, pesticide intermediates, new materials, and electronic chemicals. The company also exports its products to Germany, Japan, and India. Zhejiang Zhongxin Fluoride Materials Co., Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002942.SZ.summary: Zhejiang XinNong Chemical Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells pesticides and pharmaceutical intermediates in China. It also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Europe, the United States, Australia, and Africa. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002971.SZ.summary: Hubei Heyuan Gas Co.,Ltd. engages in the gas production and sale, and industrial tail gas recovery and purification businesses in China. The company offers medical oxygen, industrial oxygen, food nitrogen, industrial nitrogen, argon, hydrogen, helium, mixed gas, natural gas, carbon dioxide, acetylene, propane, and other liquid, and gaseous products. Its products are used in chemical, food, energy, lighting, home appliance, steel, machinery, agriculture, photovoltaic, telecommunication, electronic, and medical industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Yichang, China.

002978.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Anning Iron and Titanium Co.,Ltd.
002978.SZ.summary: Sichuan Anning Iron and Titanium Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, washing, and sale of vanadium-titanium magnetite. Its principal products are titanium and vanadium-titanium iron concentrates. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Panzhihua City, China.

002986.SZ.long_name: Hunan Yussen Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002986.SZ.summary: Hunan Yussen Energy Technology Co., Ltd., a petrochemical company, manufactures and sells acetate solvents in China. It offers sec-butyl acetate, MTBE, and isooctane products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Changsha, China.

002988.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Haomei New Material Co., Ltd.
002988.SZ.summary: Guangdong Haomei New Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum profiles in China. The company offers aluminum alloy doors and windows systems, as well as lightweight materials. Its aluminum profiles are used in buildings, rail transits, machineries, and electronic appliances. The company provides industrial profiles that are used in telecommunications, LED, machineries, automobile, computers, shipping, aviation and aerospace, rail transit, and durables; and construction profiles. It exports products to the United States, Germany, Canada, the United Kingdom, Switzerland, Singapore, Brunei, and Italy. Guangdong Haomei New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Qingyuan, China.

002996.SZ.summary: Chongqing Shunbo Aluminum Co.,Ltd. produces and sells secondary aluminum alloy ingots in China. Its products are used in automobile, motorcycle, mechanical equipment, communication equipment, electronic appliance, hardware product production in lighting, and other industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Chongqing, China.

002999.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Tianhe Agricultural Means of Production Co., Ltd.
002999.SZ.summary: Guangdong Tianhe Agricultural Means of Production Co., Ltd. provides crop solutions and agricultural products. The company sells nitrogenous and potash fertilizers, agri-chemicals, and seeds, as well as engages in warehousing and logistics activities. Its agri-chemicals include public health pesticides, seed dressing agents, preservation agents, original drugs, herbicides, fungicides, and pesticides; and fertilizers comprise foliar, specialty fertilizers, blends, NPK, potash, and urea. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

003002.SZ.summary: Shanxi Huhua Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of civil explosive equipment in China. The company offers digital electronic, high-intensity detonating tube, seismic exploration, magnetic, industrial electric, detonating tube, and high precision extended body detonators; colloidal emulsion, modified ammonium fry, powder emulsion, and expanded ammonium nitrate explosives; and explosive devices. It also provides import and export, and blasting services. The company exports its products to 16 countries and regions, including Australia, South Africa, Chile, Indonesia, and Mongolia. Shanxi Huhua Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is based in Changzhi, China.

003015.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd
003015.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of ITo film and optical hardened film products. It offers ISD, TSD, ISE, and TSE series products. The company was formerly known as Kunshan Rijiu New Energy Applied Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd in January 2015. Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Kunshan, China.

003017.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Dayang Biology Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in research and development, production, and sale of biological products, agricultural chemicals, and chemical in China and internationally. The company's products include food additive potassium carbonate, potassium carbonate, food additive potassium bicarbonate, potassium bicarbonate, agricultural grade ammonium chloride, and industrial grade ammonium chloride. It also offers chemical products, such as 2-chloro-6-fiuorobenzaldehyde, 2-chloro-6-fluorobenzyl chloride, and anisole products; veterinary APIs, including amprolium HCL; and veterinary drug premixes comprising enramycin premixes. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Jiande, China.

003022.SZ.summary: Levima Advanced Materials Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of advanced materials and specialty chemicals. It offers high-end EVA copolymers, customized polypropylene materials, ethylene oxide, ethylene oxide derivatives, etc., as well as polycarboxylate water reducers and nonionic surfactants. The company's products are used in plastics, photovoltaic, cables, household chemicals, textiles, building construction, roads and bridges, leather, painting, and other fields. It sells its products to China, the United States, Europe, Africa, Southeast Asia, etc. The company also provides pre-sale, technical support, logistics, and after-sales services. Levima Advanced Materials Corporation is based in Beijing, China.

003032.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Chuanzhi Podcast Education Technology Co., Ltd.
003032.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Chuanzhi Podcast Education Technology Co., Ltd. provides IT training courses. It offers courses in the areas of JavaEE; HTML and JS+ front end; Big Data; Python and data analysis; UI/UE design; software testing; Linux cloud computing, operation, and maintenance development; UI/UE design; and E-commerce visual operation. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

003037.SZ.summary: Guangdong Sanhe Pile Co., Ltd engages in the development, production, and sale of prestressed concrete pipe pile products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

003038.SZ.summary: Anhui Xinbo Aluminum Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy profiles. It offers aluminum products in the areas of rail, new energy photovoltaic, car lightweight, electronic appliances, medical and electrical appliances, energy-efficient buildings, system doors and windows, and other fields. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Tianchang, China.

0098.HK.summary: Xingfa Aluminium Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in aluminum profiles that are applied as construction and industrial materials in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company operates through Industrial Aluminum Profiles, Construction Aluminum Profiles, Property Development, and All Other segments. It offers aluminum alloy profile products, including heat sink profiles, rigid suspension conductive converge-wires, motor casing profiles, and alloys; aluminum profiles for elevators and refrigerated container; hollow profiles and bar materials for aerospace; plate profiles for subway carriage; cylindrical casing aluminum profiles for light products; light tube outer shells; stiffened plate profiles for shipping; and laptop outer shells. The company also manufactures and sells aluminum profiles with surface finishing, including anodic oxidation, electrophoresis coating, powder coating, and PVDF coating aluminum profiles, which are used in architecture decoration. In addition, it provides door and window systems, and building curtain wall systems; and lifting and fixed windows, railing aluminum alloy profiles, angel pipes, and flat tubes. Further, the company engages in the development and sale of office premises and residential properties; and management of properties. Additionally, it manufactures and sells precision and architecture products, as well as environment protection products; and aluminum panels, moulds, and spare parts. The company also exports its products to Australia and Vietnam. Xingfa Aluminium Holdings Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

0301.HK.summary: SANVO Fine Chemicals Group Limited, an investment holding company, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells fine industrial chemical products in the People's Republic of China, Australia, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Aerosols, Organic Silicone Adhesives, and Synthetic Adhesive. The Aerosols segment offers spray paints and automotive care products, including spray paints, carburetor cleaners, spray waxes, anti-rust spray lubricants, polyurethane foams, cleaning sprays, and spray refrigerants for automobile air-conditioners. The Organic Silicone Adhesives segment provides silicone-based adhesive. The Synthetic Adhesive segment engages in the sale of multi-purpose contact adhesives. Its products are used for hardware and building materials, and automotive maintenance applications. The company sells its products under the SANVO and FullTeam brand names. SANVO Fine Chemicals Group Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, the People's Republic of China. SANVO Fine Chemicals Group Limited is a subsidiary of Sanvo Fine Chemicals Limited.

0323.HK.summary: Maanshan Iron & Steel Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells iron and steel products, and related by-products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers hot and cold rolled, galvanized, and color coated strips; ship plates, container use strips, electric steel, pipe steel, etc.; H-beam, angle, and channel sections; cold-heading wire rods; and train wheels for wagon cars. The company also provides railway wheel and tire, bearing, spring, gear, tool and die, ring, high grade cold heading, non-quenched and tempered, anchor chain, roller, and alloy structural steel, as well as alloy tube billet, steel for heavy castings and forgings, and other series. In addition, it is involved in the production and sale of coke, coke chemical, energy, and metallic products, as well as screw threaded, round, section, angle, and deformed steel products; sale of iron ore and iron ore fines, and scrap steel products; and metallurgy and extended processing of ferrous metals and sale of resulting products, as well as extended processing of iron and steel products. Further, the company researches and develops automobile, home electrical appliances, engineering, and machinery materials; produces and sells steel and stamping spare parts; provides materials storage, and technical consulting services; offers products and equipment used in rail transport, urban transport, and machinery construction; and trades in pig iron. Additionally, it engages in the investment and trading businesses. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Maanshan, the People's Republic of China.

0347.HK.summary: Angang Steel Company Limited engages in the production, processing, and sale of steel products in the People's Republic of China. Its principal products include hot rolled sheets, medium and thick plates, cold rolled sheets, galvanized steel sheets, color coating plates, cold rolled silicon steel, heavy rails and sections, seamless steel pipes and wire rods, and other products. The company also engages in ferrous metal smelting and steel pressing and processing activities. In addition, it sells metal materials and products, and building materials, etc.; provides wholesale and retail purchasing services; develops metallurgy and related materials and equipment; and purchases and sells metal and other materials, as well as imports, exports, wholesales, and retails technology products. Further, the company engages in the purification of cooking gas; production of coal products and dissolved acetylene; and sale of compressed and liquefied gas. The company's products are used in various industries, such as machinery, metallurgy, petroleum, chemical industry, coal, electricity, railway, shipbuilding, automobile, construction, home appliances, and aviation industries. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Angang New Steel Company Limited and changed its name to Angang Steel Company Limited in June 2006. Angang Steel Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Anshan, the People's Republic of China.

0358.HK.summary: Jiangxi Copper Company Limited engages in exploring, mining, smelting, and refining copper in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. It offers copper cathodes, copper rods and wires, sulphuric acid, and other products, as well as deposit, loan, guarantee, and financing consultation services. It is involved in the processing and sale of copper and hardware electric products; collection and sale of scrap metals; production and sale of non-ferrous metals, rare metals and non-metals, electrolytic copper foil, spiral and copper tubes, copper and enameled wires, other copper pipe products, and cast iron grinding balls; provision of repair, consulting, and transportation services; exploration, mining, selection, and smelting of gold and chemical; project, industrial, and fund investment, investment management, and investment and economic information advisory services; metallurgical chemistry; equipment manufacturing and maintenance services; and development and production of thermo-electronic semiconductors and appliances. In addition, it engages in the development of chemical technologies; contracting for mining constructions; production and sale of casting products; maintenance of mechanical and electrical equipment; installation and debugging of equipment; sale of building materials; production of copper sulfate and electrolytic copper; scrap of base metals; and geological investigation and survey, and construction and engineering measurement. Further, it is involved in the sale of mineral processing, fine chemical, and other industrial and domestic products; trading of metal products; machinery processing; manufacture and sale of wear resistant materials; corporate asset and operation management, exhibition services, etc.; and trade and settlement of import-export business, offshore investment and financing, cross-border RMB settlement, and research and development activities. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.

0546.HK.summary: Fufeng Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of fermentation-based food additive, and biochemical and starch-based products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through Food Additives, Animal Nutrition, High-End Amino Acid, Colloid, and Other segments. The Food Additives segment manufactures and sells monosodium glutamate, starch sweeteners, glutamic acid, compound seasoning, and corn oil. The Animal Nutrition segment manufactures and sells corn refined products, threonine, and lysine. The High-End Amino Acid segment offers high-end amino acid products. The Colloid segment provides xanthan and gellan gum products. The Other segment offers fertilisers, synthetic ammonia, pharmaceuticals, and other products.
